// pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || '';
const SUPABASE_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || '';

const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || `no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname}`;

const supabase = createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON);

/** Create Nodemailer transporter with STARTTLS support for port 587 and secure true for 465 */
function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const options = {
    host: SMTP_HOST,
    port: SMTP_PORT,
    secure,
    auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS },
  };
  if (!secure) options.requireTLS = true;
  return nodemailer.createTransport(options);
}

function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') { return html.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, ''); }

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone = '', subject = '', message = '' } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  // prepare the row
  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    // Attempt insert. If RLS blocks anon, insertError will be set.
    const { data, error: insertError } = await supabase.from('submissions').insert([row]).select();

    if (insertError) {
      // detect common RLS/permission messages
      const msg = insertError.message || String(insertError);
      console.error('Supabase insertError:', msg);

      // helpful response for RLS case
      if (/row-level security|permission denied|not allowed/i.test(msg)) {
        return res.status(403).json({
          error: 'Supabase insert failed ‚Äî new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions".',
          details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
          hint: 'Either enable an "Allow anon inserts" RLS policy in Supabase, or use a server-side service_role key to insert.',
        });
      }

      // fallback error
      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
      });
    }

    // Insert succeeded, data[0] is the inserted row (if any)
    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0 ? data[0] : null;

    // If SMTP not configured, return success and note we skipped sending email
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved. Email skipped (SMTP not configured).' });
    }

    // create transporter and verify (gives clearer TLS/auth diagnostics)
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try {
      await transporter.verify();
    } catch (verErr) {
      console.error('SMTP verify error:', verErr && verErr.message ? verErr.message : verErr);
      // continue to try send; but return verification details in development
      // (we won't fail the whole request because data is saved)
    }

    const mailSubject = `[Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'}`;
    const html = `
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    `;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: `"${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>`,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html,
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined,
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : String(mailErr)) : undefined,
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined,
    });
  }
}

api/contact.js :- // pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || '';
const SUPABASE_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || '';

const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname};

const supabase = createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON);

/** Create Nodemailer transporter with STARTTLS support for port 587 and secure true for 465 */
function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const options = {
    host: SMTP_HOST,
    port: SMTP_PORT,
    secure,
    auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS },
  };
  if (!secure) options.requireTLS = true;
  return nodemailer.createTransport(options);
}

function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') { return html.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, ''); }

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone = '', subject = '', message = '' } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  // prepare the row
  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    // Attempt insert. If RLS blocks anon, insertError will be set.
    const { data, error: insertError } = await supabase.from('submissions').insert([row]).select();

    if (insertError) {
      // detect common RLS/permission messages
      const msg = insertError.message || String(insertError);
      console.error('Supabase insertError:', msg);

      // helpful response for RLS case
      if (/row-level security|permission denied|not allowed/i.test(msg)) {
        return res.status(403).json({
          error: 'Supabase insert failed ‚Äî new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions".',
          details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
          hint: 'Either enable an "Allow anon inserts" RLS policy in Supabase, or use a server-side service_role key to insert.',
        });
      }

      // fallback error
      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
      });
    }

    // Insert succeeded, data[0] is the inserted row (if any)
    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0 ? data[0] : null;

    // If SMTP not configured, return success and note we skipped sending email
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved. Email skipped (SMTP not configured).' });
    }

    // create transporter and verify (gives clearer TLS/auth diagnostics)
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try {
      await transporter.verify();
    } catch (verErr) {
      console.error('SMTP verify error:', verErr && verErr.message ? verErr.message : verErr);
      // continue to try send; but return verification details in development
      // (we won't fail the whole request because data is saved)
    }

    const mailSubject = [Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'};
    const html = 
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    ;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: "${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html,
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined,
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : String(mailErr)) : undefined,
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined,
    });
  }
}
pages/contact.js :-'use client';

import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
import Head from 'next/head';

export default function ContactPage() {
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    phone: '',
    subject: '',
    message: '',
    hp: '' // honeypot
  });
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [successMsg, setSuccessMsg] = useState('');
  const [errorMsg, setErrorMsg] = useState('');
  const [cooldown, setCooldown] = useState(false);

  const errorRef = useRef(null);
  const nameRef = useRef(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    // focus name on mount
    nameRef.current?.focus();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (errorMsg && errorRef.current) {
      errorRef.current.focus();
    }
  }, [errorMsg]);

  // simple email regex (not perfect but ok for client-side)
  const emailIsValid = (email) =>
    /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(email);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value }));
  };

  const handlePhoneChange = (e) => {
    let value = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '');
    if (value && !value.startsWith('91')) value = '91' + value;
    if (value.length > 2) {
      value = '+' + value.substring(0, 2) + ' ' + value.substring(2, 7) + ' ' + value.substring(7, 12);
    } else if (value.length === 2) {
      value = '+' + value;
    }
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, phone: value.substring(0, 16) }));
  };

  async function handleSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    setErrorMsg('');
    setSuccessMsg('');

    // honeypot check ‚Äî if filled, silently drop
    if (formData.hp && formData.hp.trim() !== '') {
      // pretend success to bots
      setSuccessMsg('Thank you! Your message has been sent.');
      return;
    }

    // client validation
    if (!formData.name?.trim() || !formData.email?.trim() || !formData.subject || !formData.message?.trim()) {
      setErrorMsg('Please fill in all required fields.');
      return;
    }
    if (!emailIsValid(formData.email)) {
      setErrorMsg('Please enter a valid email address.');
      return;
    }

    setLoading(true);
    try {
      const resp = await fetch('/api/contact', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          name: formData.name.trim(),
          email: formData.email.trim(),
          phone: formData.phone.trim(),
          subject: formData.subject,
          message: formData.message.trim()
        }),
      });

      const json = await resp.json().catch(() => ({}));

      if (!resp.ok) {
        // Show backend message if present. In dev show details.
        const backendMessage = json?.error || json?.message || 'Something went wrong. Please try again.';
        let showMsg = backendMessage;
        // Show extra details only in dev
        if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && json?.details) {
          showMsg +=  ‚Äî ${json.details};
        }
        setErrorMsg(showMsg);
        return;
      }

      setSuccessMsg('Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will get back to you soon.');
      setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', hp: '' });

      // short cooldown to prevent immediate resubmit
      setCooldown(true);
      setTimeout(() => setCooldown(false), 3000);

      // auto-clear success after 6s
      setTimeout(() => setSuccessMsg(''), 6000);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Network / submit error:', err);
      setErrorMsg('Network error. Please check your connection and try again.');
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }

  // SEO constants
  const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || "https://yourdomain.com";
  const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + "/contact";
  const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + "/contact-og.jpg";

  const containerStyle = { maxWidth: '1200px', margin: '0 auto', padding: '0 24px' };
  const heroStyle = { textAlign: 'center', paddingTop: '80px', paddingBottom: '48px' };
  const heroTitleStyle = { fontSize: '48px', fontWeight: '700', lineHeight: '1.2', letterSpacing: '-0.02em', marginBottom: '16px', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1e293b 0%, #3b82f6 100%)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' };
  const heroTextStyle = { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '400', lineHeight: '1.6', color: '#94a3b8', maxWidth: '600px', margin: '0 auto' };

  const infoItemStyle = { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: '16px', marginBottom: '24px' };
  const infoIconStyle = { width: '48px', height: '48px', borderRadius: '12px', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6 0%, #60a5fa 100%)', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', flexShrink: '0' };

// pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || process.env.SUPABASE_URL || '';
// Prefer server-only service role if available
const SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE = process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY || '';
const SUPABASE_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || '';

// Use service role on server if present, otherwise anon (will require RLS allow anon inserts)
const SUPABASE_KEY_TO_USE = SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE || SUPABASE_ANON;
if (!SUPABASE_KEY_TO_USE || !SUPABASE_URL) {
  console.warn('Supabase URL or key not set. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY (recommended) or NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.');
}

const supabase = createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY_TO_USE, {
  // optional: prevent auto-realtime websocket on server side
  realtime: { enabled: false },
});

const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || `no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname}`;

// helpers
function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') {
  return String(html).replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '');
}

function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const opts = {
    host: SMTP_HOST,
    port: SMTP_PORT,
    secure,
    auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS },
  };

  // for STARTTLS on 587
  if (!secure) opts.requireTLS = true;

  // DEV only: if you keep seeing certificate errors you can enable the following (NOT recommended in prod)
  // if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development') {
  //   opts.tls = { rejectUnauthorized: false };
  // }

  return nodemailer.createTransport(opts);
}

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const body = req.body || {};
  const name = (body.name || '').trim();
  const email = (body.email || '').trim();
  const phone = (body.phone || '').trim();
  const subject = (body.subject || '').trim();
  const message = (body.message || '').trim();

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  // prepare row
  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    const { data, error: insertError } = await supabase
      .from('submissions')
      .insert([row])
      .select();

    if (insertError) {
      const msg = insertError?.message || String(insertError);
      console.error('Supabase insertError:', msg);

      // Common RLS/permission message -> return 403 with hint
      if (/row-level security|permission denied|not allowed/i.test(msg)) {
        return res.status(403).json({
          error: `Supabase insert failed ‚Äî new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions".`,
          hint: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development'
            ? 'Enable RLS policy for anon or use SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY on server.'
            : 'Contact admin to enable insert policy.',
          details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
        });
      }

      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
      });
    }

    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length ? data[0] : data;

    // If SMTP not configured, return early success
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved. Email skipped (SMTP not configured).' });
    }

    // create transporter and optionally verify (good diagnostics)
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try {
      await transporter.verify();
    } catch (verifyErr) {
      console.error('SMTP verify error:', verifyErr && verifyErr.message ? verifyErr.message : verifyErr);
      // We'll proceed to try sending anyway, but surface helpful info in dev mode
    }

    const mailSubject = `[Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'}`;
    const html = `
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    `;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: `"${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>`,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html,
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined,
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : String(mailErr)) : undefined,
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined,
    });
  }
}

// pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || '';
const SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE = process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY || '';

if (!SUPABASE_URL || !SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE) {
  console.warn('Missing SUPABASE_URL or SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY in environment.');
}

// create an admin client that uses service_role (server-only)
const supabaseAdmin = createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE, {
  auth: { persistSession: false }
});

/* SMTP envs */
const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || `no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname}`;

function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') { return html.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, ''); }

function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const opts = {
    host: SMTP_HOST,
    port: SMTP_PORT,
    secure,
    auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS },
  };
  if (!secure) opts.requireTLS = true;
  return nodemailer.createTransport(opts);
}

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone = '', subject = '', message = '' } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  // Prepare row
  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    // Insert using service role (bypasses RLS)
    const { data, error: insertError } = await supabaseAdmin
      .from('submissions')
      .insert([row])
      .select();

    if (insertError) {
      console.error('Supabase admin insert error:', insertError);
      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed (admin).',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? insertError.message || insertError : undefined,
      });
    }

    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length ? data[0] : null;

    // If SMTP is not configured, return success for DB save
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured, skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved (email skipped).' });
    }

    // send email
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try {
      await transporter.verify();
    } catch (vErr) {
      console.warn('SMTP verify warning:', vErr && vErr.message ? vErr.message : vErr);
      // continue to try send (we saved the DB already)
    }

    const mailSubject = `[Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'}`;
    const html = `
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    `;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: `"${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>`,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html,
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined,
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr?.message || String(mailErr)) : undefined,
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined,
    });
  }
}

1) Idempotent / safe SQL (paste into Supabase SQL editor)
-- Safe idempotent script to enable RLS and allow anonymous inserts on public.submissions
-- (run in Supabase SQL editor or via CLI)

DO $$
BEGIN
  -- 1) Enable row-level security only if not already enabled
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM pg_class c
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
    WHERE c.relname = 'submissions'
      AND n.nspname = 'public'
      AND c.relrowsecurity = true
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE public.submissions ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY';
  END IF;

  -- 2) Create the policy for anon inserts only if it does not already exist
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM pg_policies
    WHERE tablename = 'submissions'
      AND policyname = 'allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions'
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE $pol$
      CREATE POLICY allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions
      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO anon
      WITH CHECK (true);
    $pol$;
  END IF;

END
$$;
Notes:

This script uses IF NOT EXISTS checks so it will not raise errors if RLS or the policy already exists.

The policy is created with name allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions (explicit name to avoid duplicates).

WITH CHECK (true) allows inserts from the anon role into the table; make sure your table columns don't have server-side constraints that expect values you don't supply (e.g., non-null columns with no defaults).

// pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

// from env
const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || process.env.SUPABASE_URL || '';
const SUPABASE_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || '';
const SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE = process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY || '';

// choose client: prefer service_role on server for inserts (secure). Fallback to anon.
const usingServiceRole = Boolean(SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE);
const supabaseKey = usingServiceRole ? SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE : SUPABASE_ANON;

// safety check
if (!SUPABASE_URL || !supabaseKey) {
  console.warn('Supabase URL or key missing. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY (or SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY) in env.');
}

const supabase = createClient(SUPABASE_URL, supabaseKey);

/* SMTP envs */
const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || `no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname}`;

function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const opts = { host: SMTP_HOST, port: SMTP_PORT, secure, auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS } };
  if (!secure) opts.requireTLS = true;
  return nodemailer.createTransport(opts);
}

function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') { return html.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, ''); }

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone = '', subject = '', message = '' } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  // prepare row (make sure your table columns match)
  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    // Attempt insert
    const { data, error: insertError } = await supabase.from('submissions').insert([row]).select();

    if (insertError) {
      const msg = insertError.message || String(insertError);
      console.error('Supabase insertError:', msg);

      // RLS / permission denial case -> return helpful message
      if (/row-level security|permission denied|not allowed/i.test(msg)) {
        return res.status(403).json({
          error: 'Supabase insert failed ‚Äî new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions".',
          hint: usingServiceRole
            ? 'Unexpected: using service_role but insert denied. Check DB constraints and policies.'
            : 'Enable an "Allow anon inserts" policy OR use SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY in server env (safer).',
          details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined
        });
      }

      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined
      });
    }

    // Insert succeeded
    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length ? data[0] : null;

    // If SMTP not configured, respond success and skip email
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved. Email skipped (SMTP not configured).' });
    }

    // send email
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try { await transporter.verify(); } catch (verErr) { console.error('SMTP verify:', verErr && verErr.message ? verErr.message : verErr); }

    const mailSubject = `[Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'}`;
    const html = `
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    `;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: `"${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>`,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : String(mailErr)) : undefined
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined
    });
  }
}

Problem kya tha?
Supabase bol raha tha:
new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions"

Matlab: RLS (Row Level Security) ON hai but tere anon user ke liye insert allow nahi tha.

Tu ne policy banayi thi, but error isliye aaya kyunki policy code galat syntax se likha tha ya duplicate policy ban gayi thi.

Solution ka simple process
Safe SQL script chalani hai jo:

RLS enable kare agar already enable nahi hai.

anon user ke liye insert allow kare (sirf wahi).

Duplicate policy na banaye.

Correct SQL (hinglish explanation ke sath)
DO $$
BEGIN
  -- 1) Agar RLS ON nahi hai to enable kar de
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM pg_class c
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
    WHERE c.relname = 'submissions'
      AND n.nspname = 'public'
      AND c.relrowsecurity = true
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE public.submissions ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY';
  END IF;

  -- 2) Agar anon insert policy already nahi bani hai to bana de
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies
    WHERE tablename = 'submissions'
      AND policyname = 'allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions'
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'CREATE POLICY allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions ON public.submissions
             FOR INSERT TO anon
             WITH CHECK (true)';
  END IF;
END
$$;

    WHERE c.relname = 'submissions'

    EXECUTE $policy$
      CREATE POLICY allow_anon_inserts
      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO anon
      WITH CHECK (true);
    $policy$;

  -- 3) Optionally create a fallback public policy for older tools (safe - only if missing)

    WHERE tablename = 'submissions'
      AND policyname = 'allow_public_inserts'

    EXECUTE $policy2$

      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO public
      WITH CHECK (true);

  END IF;
END;
$$;

DO $$
BEGIN

  IF EXISTS (

    WHERE p.tablename = 'submissions'
      AND p.cmd = 'INSERT'

      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO anon
      WITH CHECK (true);
    $policy$;
  END IF;
END;
$$;

Kyun: Server-side code ko service_role use karna safe hai (server environment variable mein rakho). service_role RLS bypass karta hai ‚Äî insert hamesha chalega. Ye easiest, reliable & secure way hai agar tum server API use kar rahe ho (pages/api/contact.js).

Kya karna hai:

Supabase dashboard ‚Üí Project Settings ‚Üí API ‚Üí copy Service Role Key (SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY).

Vercel / Netlify / local .env mein add karo: SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=xxxxx (never commit to git).

Replace karo pages/api/contact.js file with the code below (full file) ‚Äî ye server pe service role se insert karega aur phir mail bhejega.

Full pages/api/contact.js (replace exactly):

// pages/api/contact.js
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import nodemailer from 'nodemailer';

const SUPABASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL || process.env.SUPABASE_URL || '';
const SUPABASE_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || '';
const SUPABASE_SERVICE = process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY || '';

const SMTP_HOST = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
const SMTP_PORT = process.env.SMTP_PORT ? Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT) : 587;
const SMTP_USER = process.env.SMTP_USER;
const SMTP_PASS = process.env.SMTP_PASS;
const EMAIL_TO = process.env.EMAIL_TO;
const FROM_NAME = process.env.FROM_NAME || 'Website';
const FROM_EMAIL = process.env.FROM_EMAIL || SMTP_USER || `no-reply@${new URL(SUPABASE_URL || 'https://example.com').hostname}`;

const supabaseAdmin = SUPABASE_SERVICE ? createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_SERVICE) : null;
const supabaseAnon = SUPABASE_ANON ? createClient(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON) : null;

function createTransporter() {
  const secure = SMTP_PORT === 465;
  const options = {
    host: SMTP_HOST,
    port: SMTP_PORT,
    secure,
    auth: { user: SMTP_USER, pass: SMTP_PASS },
  };
  if (!secure) options.requireTLS = true;
  return nodemailer.createTransport(options);
}

function escapeHtml(str = '') {
  return String(str)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
function stripHtml(html = '') { return html.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, ''); }

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone = '', subject = '', message = '' } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email || !message) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'Missing required fields: name, email, message.' });
  }

  const row = { name, email, phone, subject, message, source: 'website-contact' };

  try {
    // Use service role if available (recommended). Fallback to anon client if not.
    const dbClient = supabaseAdmin || supabaseAnon;
    if (!dbClient) {
      return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Supabase client not configured on server.' });
    }

    const { data, error: insertError } = await dbClient.from('submissions').insert([row]).select();

    if (insertError) {
      const msg = insertError.message || String(insertError);
      console.error('Supabase insertError:', msg);

      // If it's an RLS error, give actionable hint
      if (/row-level security|permission denied|not allowed/i.test(msg)) {
        return res.status(403).json({
          error: 'Supabase insert failed ‚Äî new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions".',
          hint: SUPABASE_SERVICE ? undefined : 'Either set SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY for your server, or add an RLS policy allowing anon inserts in Supabase.',
          details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
        });
      }

      return res.status(500).json({
        error: 'Supabase insert failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? msg : undefined,
      });
    }

    const inserted = Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0 ? data[0] : null;

    // Mail sending (if configured)
    if (!SMTP_HOST || !SMTP_USER || !SMTP_PASS || !EMAIL_TO) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ message: 'Submission saved. Email skipped (SMTP not configured).' });
    }

    const transporter = createTransporter();
    try { await transporter.verify(); } catch (ver) { console.warn('SMTP verify warning:', ver && ver.message); }

    const mailSubject = `[Soarix Contact] ${subject || 'New message'}`;
    const html = `
      <p>New contact submission:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Name:</strong> ${escapeHtml(name)}</li>
        <li><strong>Email:</strong> ${escapeHtml(email)}</li>
        <li><strong>Phone:</strong> ${escapeHtml(phone)}</li>
        <li><strong>Subject:</strong> ${escapeHtml(subject)}</li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong>Message:</strong></p>
      <div style="white-space:pre-wrap;border-left:4px solid #eee;padding-left:12px">${escapeHtml(message)}</div>
      <hr/>
      <p>Stored in Supabase (id: ${inserted?.id ?? 'unknown'})</p>
    `;

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail({
        from: `"${FROM_NAME}" <${FROM_EMAIL}>`,
        to: EMAIL_TO,
        subject: mailSubject,
        text: stripHtml(html),
        html,
      });

      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved and email sent.',
        mailInfo: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? info : undefined,
      });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Mail send error:', mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : mailErr);
      return res.status(200).json({
        message: 'Submission saved but email failed.',
        error: 'Email sending failed',
        details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (mailErr && mailErr.message ? mailErr.message : String(mailErr)) : undefined,
      });
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Unexpected server error:', e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    return res.status(500).json({
      error: 'Server error',
      details: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? (e?.message || String(e)) : undefined,
    });
  }
}
Important: Set SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY in your host (Vercel environment variables) and restart deployment / dev server.

Option B ‚Äî If you must use ANON key (make RLS accept anon inserts)
Run this safe/idempotent SQL in Supabase SQL editor (it will NOT create duplicates and will allow anon & authenticated inserts):

DO $$
BEGIN
  -- enable RLS if not already set
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM pg_class c
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
    WHERE c.relname = 'submissions'
      AND n.nspname = 'public'
      AND c.relrowsecurity = true
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE public.submissions ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY';
  END IF;

  -- create a single policy to allow anon/authenticated inserts if missing
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies p WHERE p.tablename = 'submissions' AND p.policyname = 'allow_public_inserts'
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE $$
      CREATE POLICY allow_public_inserts
      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO anon, authenticated
      WITH CHECK (true);
    $$;
  END IF;
END;
$$;

relrowsecurity should be true.

Why you still saw the error even after creating policies earlier
Possible reasons (quick summary):

Policy you created did not include the actual role making the insert (e.g., insert used role authenticated but policy only allowed anon, or vice-versa).

Duplicate or conflicting policies existed and earlier script had syntax issues (you saw SQL syntax errors earlier).

You ran SQL under a different role or created policy but the one in effect wasn't the one your client used.

Or your server API is using the ANON key but your RLS policy doesn't include that role.

Hence Option A (service_role) removes all uncertainty. Option B is fine but you must ensure policy includes both anon and authenticated (I included both).

Error: new row violates row-level security policy for table "submissions" matlab Supabase ki Row-Level Security (RLS) ne aapke INSERT ko block kar diya.

Do common reasons:

Koi policy nahi jo anon (browser/public) ya authenticated role ko insert allow kare ‚Äî isliye block.

Server-side API se ANON key use kar raha hai ‚Äî kabhi kabhi server requests ko anon role ke saath treat nahi kiya jata; recommended secure way server se insert karne ka: service_role key (server-only).

Tu bola tu anon key se hi chahiye. Theek hai ‚Äî hum policy aisi banayenge jo public/anon ko insert allow kare (safe / idempotent script) aur ensure karenge koi duplicate policies na hon jiski wajah se confusion ho.

2) Safe, idempotent SQL ‚Äî paste in Supabase SQL editor and Run
Yeh script non-destructive aur idempotent hai: pehle RLS enable karega (agar required), phir ek policy create karega agar nahi hai. Agar duplicate na hone chahiye toh pehle existing specific policy hata ke phir sahi policy create karne ka option bhi de raha hoon (niche).

Copy-paste yeh (SQL editor mein run kar):

-- 1) Enable row level security (safe, if already enabled does nothing)
ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.submissions ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- 2) Create a single idempotent policy that allows public/anon inserts
DO $$
BEGIN
  IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM pg_policies
    WHERE tablename = 'submissions'
      AND policyname = 'allow_public_inserts'
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE $policy$
      CREATE POLICY allow_public_inserts
      ON public.submissions
      FOR INSERT
      TO anon, authenticated, public
      WITH CHECK (true);
    $policy$;
  END IF;
END;
$$;
Note: policyname allow_public_inserts rakha hai ‚Äî agar pehle se different-named policies hain, woh reh jayenge (but multiple policies can exist; ek sufficient honi chahiye). Agar tu clean single policy chahte ho, niche DROP step de raha hoon.

(Optional) Agar tu puri tarah duplicates hata ke sirf ek policy chahiye:
Use this (it drops the known names then creates one):

-- DROP known duplicates (safe only if you own these policies)
DO $$
BEGIN
  IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename='submissions' AND policyname='Allow anon inserts') THEN
    EXECUTE 'DROP POLICY "Allow anon inserts" ON public.submissions';
  END IF;
  IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename='submissions' AND policyname='Allow anon inserts for submissions') THEN
    EXECUTE 'DROP POLICY "Allow anon inserts for submissions" ON public.submissions';
  END IF;
  IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename='submissions' AND policyname='allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions') THEN
    EXECUTE 'DROP POLICY allow_anon_inserts_for_submissions ON public.submissions';
  END IF;
  IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename='submissions' AND policyname='allow_public_inserts') THEN
    -- already exists - skip
  ELSE
    EXECUTE $pol$ CREATE POLICY allow_public_inserts ON public.submissions FOR INSERT TO anon, authenticated, public WITH CHECK (true); $pol$;
  END IF;
END;
$$;

import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
import Head from 'next/head';

export default function ContactPage() {
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    name: '',
    email: '',
    phone: '',
    subject: '',
    message: '',
    hp: '' // honeypot
  });
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [successMsg, setSuccessMsg] = useState('');
  const [errorMsg, setErrorMsg] = useState('');
  const [cooldown, setCooldown] = useState(false);

  const errorRef = useRef(null);
  const nameRef = useRef(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    // focus name on mount
    nameRef.current?.focus();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (errorMsg && errorRef.current) {
      errorRef.current.focus();
    }
  }, [errorMsg]);

  // simple email regex (not perfect but ok for client-side)
  const emailIsValid = (email) =>
    /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(email);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value }));
  };

  const handlePhoneChange = (e) => {
    let value = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '');
    if (value && !value.startsWith('91')) value = '91' + value;
    if (value.length > 2) {
      value = '+' + value.substring(0, 2) + ' ' + value.substring(2, 7) + ' ' + value.substring(7, 12);
    } else if (value.length === 2) {
      value = '+' + value;
    }
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, phone: value.substring(0, 16) }));
  };

  async function handleSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    setErrorMsg('');
    setSuccessMsg('');

    // honeypot check ‚Äî if filled, silently drop
    if (formData.hp && formData.hp.trim() !== '') {
      // pretend success to bots
      setSuccessMsg('Thank you! Your message has been sent.');
      return;
    }

    // client validation
    if (!formData.name?.trim() || !formData.email?.trim() || !formData.subject || !formData.message?.trim()) {
      setErrorMsg('Please fill in all required fields.');
      return;
    }
    if (!emailIsValid(formData.email)) {
      setErrorMsg('Please enter a valid email address.');
      return;
    }

    setLoading(true);
    try {
      const resp = await fetch('/api/contact', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          name: formData.name.trim(),
          email: formData.email.trim(),
          phone: formData.phone.trim(),
          subject: formData.subject,
          message: formData.message.trim()
        }),
      });

      const json = await resp.json().catch(() => ({}));

  const emailIsValid = (email) =>
    /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(email);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value }));
  };

  const handlePhoneChange = (e) => {
    let value = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '');
    if (value && !value.startsWith('91')) value = '91' + value;
    if (value.length > 2) {
      value = '+' + value.substring(0, 2) + ' ' + value.substring(2, 7) + ' ' + value.substring(7, 12);
    } else if (value.length === 2) {
      value = '+' + value;
    }
    setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, phone: value.substring(0, 16) }));
  };

  async function handleSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    setErrorMsg('');
    setSuccessMsg('');

    // honeypot check ‚Äî if filled, silently drop
    if (formData.hp && formData.hp.trim() !== '') {
      // pretend success to bots
      setSuccessMsg('Thank you! Your message has been sent.');
      return;
    }

    // client validation
    if (!formData.name?.trim() || !formData.email?.trim() || !formData.subject || !formData.message?.trim()) {
      setErrorMsg('Please fill in all required fields.');
      return;
    }
    if (!emailIsValid(formData.email)) {
      setErrorMsg('Please enter a valid email address.');
      return;
    }

    setLoading(true);
    try {
      const resp = await fetch('/api/contact', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          name: formData.name.trim(),
          email: formData.email.trim(),
          phone: formData.phone.trim(),
          subject: formData.subject,
          message: formData.message.trim()
        }),
      });

      const json = await resp.json().catch(() => ({}));

      if (!resp.ok) {
        // Show backend message if present. In dev show details.
        const backendMessage = json?.error || json?.message || 'Something went wrong. Please try again.';
        let showMsg = backendMessage;
        // Show extra details only in dev
        if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && json?.details) {
          showMsg +=  ‚Äî ${json.details};
        }
        setErrorMsg(showMsg);
        return;
      }

      setSuccessMsg('Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will get back to you soon.');
      setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', hp: '' });

      // short cooldown to prevent immediate resubmit
      setCooldown(true);
      setTimeout(() => setCooldown(false), 3000);

      // auto-clear success after 6s
      setTimeout(() => setSuccessMsg(''), 6000);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Network / submit error:', err);
      setErrorMsg('Network error. Please check your connection and try again.');
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }

  // SEO constants

// pages/contact.js
'use client';

import Head from 'next/head';
import { useEffect } from 'react';

export default function ContactInfoPage() {
  useEffect(() => {
    if (window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches) {
      document.documentElement.classList.add('reduce-motion');
    }
  }, []);

  const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || 'https://yourdomain.com';
  const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + '/contact';
  const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + '/contact-og.jpg';

  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Contact | Soarix</title>
        <meta name="description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />

        <meta property="og:description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />
        <meta property="og:image" content={OG_IMAGE} />
        <meta property="og:url" content={PAGE_URL} />
      </Head>

      <main style={styles.page}>
        <header style={styles.header}>
          <h1 style={styles.title}>Contact Information</h1>
          <p style={styles.subtitle}>We'd love to hear from you. Find our contact details below.</p>
        </header>

        <section style={styles.gridWrap}>
          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Location"
            icon={<IconLocation />}
            title="Our Location"
            text={<><span>Soarix Digital Agency Pvt. Ltd.</span><br/>Andheri, Mira-Road, Malad<br/>India</>}
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Phone"
            icon={<IconPhone />}
            title="Phone"
            text={<><span>+91 xxxxxxxxxx</span><br/>+91 xxxxxxxxxx</>}
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Email"
            icon={<IconMail />}
            title="Email"
            text={<><span>hello@soarix.in</span><br/>support@soarix.in</>}
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Working hours"
            icon={<IconClock />}
            title="Working Hours"
            text={<><span>Mon‚ÄìFri: 9:30 AM - 6:30 PM</span><br/>Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM<br/>Sun: Closed</>}
          />
        </section>

        {/* Indian customers block */}
        <section style={styles.indiaWrap} aria-label="For Indian customers">

              We understand the unique needs of Indian businesses and consumers. Our team provides support
              in English, Hindi, Marathi and major regional languages mail or call us and we'll assist you.
            </p>
          </div>
        </section>

        <style jsx global>{
          @keyframes fadeSlideUp {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(18px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
          }
          .info-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.06s; }
          .info-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.18s; }
          .info-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.30s; }
          .info-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.42s; }
          .reduce-motion .info-card { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; }
          @media (max-width: 880px) {
            .info-card { width: 100% !important; margin-bottom: 18px !important; }
            main { padding: 28px 20px !important; }
          }
        }</style>
      </main>
    </>
  );
}

            text-align: center;
            max-width: 920px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding: 0 8px;
          }
          .contact-title {
            font-size: 34px;
            margin: 0;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #07103a;
          }
          .contact-sub {
            margin-top: 10px;
            font-size: 16px;
            color: #475569;
            max-width: 820px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }

          .grid-wrap {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 420px));
            gap: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 980px;
            margin-top: 12px;
            padding: 8px;
            align-items: stretch;
          }

          .card {
            background: #fff;
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 18px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 14px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 28px rgba(12,19,34,0.06);
            transition: transform 220ms cubic-bezier(.2,.9,.3,1), box-shadow 220ms;
            min-height: 110px;
            align-items: flex-start;
            will-change: transform, box-shadow;
          }

          .card:focus-within,
          .card:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(12,19,34,0.12); }

          .icon-wrap {
            width: 64px;
            height: 64px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg,#3b82f6 0%, #60a5fa 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #fff;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(59,130,246,0.14);
          }

          .card-title {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 17px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #07103a;
          }
          .card-text {
            margin-top: 8px;
            color: #64748b;
            line-height: 1.6;
            font-size: 15px;
          }

          /* location list + pins */
          .location-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 8px;
          }
          .location-list li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            color: #0b1220;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 15px;
          }
          .pin {
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            transform-origin: center;
            will-change: transform, opacity;
            margin-left: 2px;
          }

          /* subtle pin float + pulse */
          @keyframes pinFloat {
            0% { transform: translateY(0); }
            50% { transform: translateY(-3px); }
            100% { transform: translateY(0); }
          }
          @keyframes pinPulse {
            0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(59,130,246,0.18); }
            70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 8px rgba(59,130,246,0.02); }
            100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(59,130,246,0); }
          }
          .pin svg { display: block; }
          .pin { animation: pinFloat 2.2s ease-in-out infinite; }
          .pin::after { content: ''; display: block; border-radius: 50%; width: 18px; height: 18px; position: relative; top: -18px; animation: pinPulse 2.2s infinite; opacity: 0.9; }

          /* India block */
          .india-wrap {
            margin-top: 26px;
            max-width: 980px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 14px;
            align-items: center;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(59,130,246,0.04), rgba(59,130,246,0.02));
            border-left: 3px solid #3b82f6;
            padding: 14px;
            border-radius: 10px;
          }
          .flag-wrap { flex: 0 0 auto; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
          .india-title { margin: 0; color: #0b61e6; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; }
          .india-text { margin: 0; color: #475569; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 14.5px; }

          .link { color: inherit; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600; }
          .link:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #0b61e6; }

          /* responsive */
          @media (max-width: 880px) {
            .grid-wrap { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 14px; padding: 0; }
            .contact-title { font-size: 30px; }
            .icon-wrap { width: 56px; height: 56px; }
            .card { padding: 14px; border-radius: 10px; }
            .india-wrap { padding: 12px; gap: 12px; }
            .location-list li { font-size: 15px; }
            .contact-page { padding: 36px 16px; }
          }

          /* reduced motion */
          .reduce-motion .pin { animation: none !important; }
          .reduce-motion .card { transition: none !important; transform: none !important; box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(12,19,34,0.06) !important; }
        `}</style>

}

// pages/contact.js
'use client';

import Head from 'next/head';
import { useEffect } from 'react';

export default function ContactInfoPage() {
  useEffect(() => {
    if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches) {
      document.documentElement.classList.add('reduce-motion');
    }
  }, []);

  const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || 'https://yourdomain.com';
  const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + '/contact';
  const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + '/contact-og.jpg';

  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Contact | Soarix</title>
        <meta name="description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />
        <meta property="og:title" content="Contact | Soarix" />
        <meta property="og:description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />
        <meta property="og:image" content={OG_IMAGE} />
        <meta property="og:url" content={PAGE_URL} />
        <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
      </Head>

      <main className="contact-page" id="contact-page">
        <header className="contact-header">
          <h1 className="contact-title">Contact Information</h1>
          <p className="contact-sub">We'd love to hear from you. Find our contact details below.</p>
        </header>

        <section className="grid-wrap" aria-label="Contact information cards">
          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Location"
            icon={<IconLocation />}
            title="Our Locations"
            text={
              <ul className="location-list" aria-label="office locations">
                <LocationItem name="Andheri" />
                <LocationItem name="Mira Road" />
                <LocationItem name="Malad" />
              </ul>
            }
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Phone"
            icon={<IconPhone />}
            title="Phone"
            text={
              <div className="contact-links">
                <a href="tel:+919876543210" className="link">+91 98765 43210</a><br />
                <a href="tel:+918765432109" className="link">+91 87654 32109</a>
              </div>
            }
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Email"
            icon={<IconMail />}
            title="Email"
            text={
              <div className="contact-links">
                <a href="mailto:hello@soarix.in" className="link">hello@soarix.in</a><br />
                <a href="mailto:support@soarix.in" className="link">support@soarix.in</a>
              </div>
            }
          />

          <ContactCard
            ariaLabel="Working hours"
            icon={<IconClock />}
            title="Working Hours"
            text={<div>Mon‚ÄìFri: 9:30 AM - 6:30 PM<br />Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM<br />Sun: Closed</div>}
          />
        </section>

        <section className="india-wrap" aria-label="For Indian customers">
          <div className="flag-wrap" aria-hidden><IconIndia /></div>
          <div className="india-content">
            <h3 className="india-title">For Indian Customers</h3>
            <p className="india-text">
              We understand unique needs of Indian businesses and consumers. Our team provides support in English, Hindi, Marathi and other regional languages ‚Äî mail or call us and we'll assist you.
            </p>
          </div>
        </section>

        <style jsx>{`
          :root {
            --bg: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbf8f6 0%, #f8f5f2 100%);
            --card-bg: #fff;
            --muted: #64748b;
            --title: #07103a;
            --accent: #0b61e6;
          }
          .contact-page {
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 64px 20px;
            font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial;
            background: var(--bg);
            color: #0f172a;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            box-sizing: border-box;
          }

          .contact-header {
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 980px;
          }
          .contact-title {
            font-size: 44px;
            margin: 0;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--title);
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
          }
          .contact-sub {
            margin-top: 10px;
            font-size: 17px;
            color: #475569;
            max-width: 820px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }

          .grid-wrap {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 420px));
            gap: 28px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 980px;
            margin-top: 28px;
            align-items: start;
          }

          .card {
            background: var(--card-bg);
            border-radius: 14px;
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 16px;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 26px rgba(12,19,34,0.06);
            transition: transform 240ms cubic-bezier(.2,.9,.3,1), box-shadow 240ms;
            align-items: flex-start;
            min-height: 116px;
            will-change: transform, box-shadow;
          }
          .card:focus-within, .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-6px);
            box-shadow: 0 18px 48px rgba(12,19,34,0.12);
          }

          .icon-wrap {
            width: 64px;
            height: 64px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg,#3b82f6 0%, #60a5fa 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(59,130,246,0.14);
          }

          .card-title {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--title);
          }
          .card-text {
            margin-top: 8px;
            color: var(--muted);
            line-height: 1.6;
            font-size: 15px;
          }

          /* link styles in cards */
          .link {
            color: var(--accent);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: color 120ms ease;
          }
          .link:hover { color: #0546c8; text-decoration: underline; }

          /* location list + pins */
          .location-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
          }
          .location-list li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #0b1220;
            font-size: 15.5px;
          }
          .pin {
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            display: inline-block;
            transform-origin: center bottom;
            animation: pinFloat 2.4s ease-in-out infinite;
          }

          @keyframes pinFloat {
            0% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
            50% { transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02); opacity: 0.98; }
            100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
          }

          /* India box */
          .india-wrap {
            margin-top: 36px;
            max-width: 980px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 16px;
            align-items: center;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(59,130,246,0.03), rgba(59,130,246,0.01));
            border-left: 3px solid #3b82f6;
            padding: 18px 20px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(12,19,34,0.04);
          }
          .flag-wrap {
            flex: 0 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 64px;
          }
          .india-title {
            margin: 0;
            color: #0b61e6;
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
          }
          .india-text {
            margin-top: 6px;
            color: #475569;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 1.6;
          }

          /* small animation delays for subtle entrance */
          .card { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(12px) scale(0.998); animation: appearUp 520ms cubic-bezier(.2,.9,.3,1) forwards; }
          .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(1){ animation-delay: 0.06s; }
          .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(2){ animation-delay: 0.16s; }
          .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(3){ animation-delay: 0.26s; }
          .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(4){ animation-delay: 0.36s; }

          @keyframes appearUp {
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0) scale(1); }
          }

          /* accessibility: respect reduced motion */
          .reduce-motion .card, .reduce-motion .pin { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; }

          /* responsive tweaks */
          @media (max-width: 880px) {
            .grid-wrap { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 18px; padding: 0 6px; }
            .contact-title { font-size: 32px; }
            .card { padding: 16px; min-height: 100px; }
            .icon-wrap { width: 56px; height: 56px; }
            .india-wrap { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px; padding: 14px; }
            .flag-wrap { width: 48px; }
          }

          @media (max-width: 420px) {
            .contact-page { padding: 36px 12px; }
            .contact-sub { font-size: 15px; }
            .card { gap: 12px; }
          }
        `}</style>
      </main>
    </>
  );
}

/* ---------- ContactCard component ---------- */
function ContactCard({ ariaLabel, icon, title, text }) {
  return (
    <article className="card" role="article" aria-label={ariaLabel}>
      <div className="icon-wrap" aria-hidden>{icon}</div>
      <div style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <h3 className="card-title">{title}</h3>
        <div className="card-text">{text}</div>
      </div>
    </article>
  );
}

/* ---------- location item (pin + text) ---------- */
function LocationItem({ name }) {
  return (
    <li>
      <span className="pin" aria-hidden><PinSVG /></span>
      <span>{name}</span>
    </li>
  );
}

/* ---------- Small SVGs used ---------- */
function PinSVG() {
  return (
    <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" aria-hidden>
      <path d="M12 2C8.134 2 5 5.134 5 9c0 5.25 7 12 7 12s7-6.75 7-12c0-3.866-3.134-7-7-7z" fill="#0b61e6"/>
      <circle cx="12" cy="9" r="2.6" fill="#fff"/>
    </svg>
  );
}
function IconLocation() {
  return (
    <svg width="34" height="34" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" aria-hidden>
      <path d="M12 2C8.134 2 5 5.134 5 9c0 5.25 7 12 7 12s7-6.75 7-12c0-3.866-3.134-7-7-7z" fill="#fff"/>
      <circle cx="12" cy="9" r="2.6" fill="#0769ff"/>
    </svg>
  );
}
function IconPhone() {
  return (
    <svg width="30" height="30" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" aria-hidden>
      <path d="M6.62 10.79a15.05 15.05 0 006.6 6.6l1.8-1.8a1 1 0 01.99-.24 11.2 11.2 0 003.5.56 1 1 0 011 1V20a1 1 0 01-1 1A17 17 0 013 5a1 1 0 011-1h3.2a1 1 0 011 1 11.2 11.2 0 00.56 3.5 1 1 0 01-.24.99L6.62 10.79z" fill="#fff"/>
      <path d="M6 4h.01" fill="#0769ff"/>
    </svg>
  );
}
function IconMail() {
  return (
    <svg width="30" height="30" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" aria-hidden>
      <rect x="2" y="5" width="20" height="14" rx="2" fill="#fff"/>
      <path d="M3 7l9 6 9-6" stroke="#0769ff" strokeWidth="1.6" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  );
}
function IconClock() {
  return (
    <svg width="30" height="30" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" aria-hidden>
      <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="9" fill="#fff"/>
      <path d="M12 7v5l3 2" stroke="#0769ff" strokeWidth="1.6" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  );
}
function IconIndia() {
  return (
    <svg width="46" height="30" viewBox="0 0 600 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-hidden>
      <rect width="600" height="400" fill="#fff"/>
      <rect width="600" height="133.333" y="0" fill="#ff9933"/>
      <rect width="600" height="133.333" y="133.333" fill="#fff"/>
      <rect width="600" height="133.333" y="266.666" fill="#138808"/>
      <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="35" fill="#000080"/>
    </svg>
  );
}

/* ---------- ContactCard component ---------- */
import { forwardRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react';

const ContactCard = forwardRef(({ ariaLabel, icon, title, text, isVisible }, ref) => {
  const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false);
  
  return (
    <article 
      ref={ref} 
      className={card ${isVisible ? 'visible' : ''}}
      role="article" 
      aria-label={ariaLabel}
      onMouseEnter={() => setIsHovered(true)}
      onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)}
    >
      <div className="icon-wrap" aria-hidden>
        {icon}
      </div>
      <div style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <h3 className="card-title">{title}</h3>
        <div className="card-text">{text}</div>
      </div>
    </article>
  );
});

ContactCard.displayName = 'ContactCard';

const ContactCard = forwardRef(({ ariaLabel, icon, title, text, isVisible }, ref) => {
  const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false);

  return (
    <article
      ref={ref}
      id={/* pass id from props? parent already sets id on ContactCard usage via prop 'id' but to ensure observer target has id, you can also set it in parent */}
      className={`card ${isVisible ? 'visible' : ''}`}
      role="article"
      aria-label={ariaLabel}
      onMouseEnter={() => setIsHovered(true)}
      onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)}
    >
      <div className="icon-wrap" aria-hidden>{icon}</div>
      <div style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <h3 className="card-title">{title}</h3>
        <div className="card-text">{text}</div>
      </div>
    </article>
  );
});

ContactCard.displayName = 'ContactCard';

// pages/contact.js
'use client';

import React, { forwardRef, useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';
import Head from 'next/head';

export default function ContactInfoPage() {
  const cardRefs = useRef([]);
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState({});

  useEffect(() => {
    if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches) {
      document.documentElement.classList.add('reduce-motion');
    }

    // Intersection Observer for scroll animations
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          setIsVisible(prev => ({ ...prev, [entry.target.id]: true }));
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.12 });

    cardRefs.current.forEach(card => {
      if (card) observer.observe(card);
    });

    return () => observer.disconnect();
  }, []);

  const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || 'https://yourdomain.com';
  const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + '/contact';
  const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + '/contact-og.jpg';

  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Contact | Soarix</title>
        <meta name="description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />

        <meta property="og:description" content="Contact Soarix ‚Äî location, phone, email and working hours." />
        <meta property="og:image" content={OG_IMAGE} />
        <meta property="og:url" content={PAGE_URL} />
        <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
      </Head>

      <main className="contact-page">
        <div className="gradient-overlay" />
        <div className="content-wrapper">
          <header className="contact-header">
