              <h1 className="contact-title">Let's Connect</h1>
              <p className="contact-sub">
                We'd love to hear from you. Reach out through your preferred channel below.
              </p>
            </div>
          </header>

          <section className="grid-wrap" aria-label="Contact info cards">
            <ContactCard
              ref={(el) => (cardRefs.current[0] = el)}
              id="location-card"
              isVisible={isVisible['location-card']}
              ariaLabel="Location"
              icon={<IconLocation />}
              title="Our Locations"
              text={
                <ul className="location-list" aria-label="office locations">
                  <li><span className="pin" aria-hidden><PinSVG /></span><span>Andheri</span></li>
                  <li><span className="pin" aria-hidden><PinSVG /></span><span>Mira Road</span></li>
                  <li><span className="pin" aria-hidden><PinSVG /></span><span>Malad</span></li>
                </ul>
              }
            />

            <ContactCard
              ref={(el) => (cardRefs.current[1] = el)}
              id="phone-card"
              isVisible={isVisible['phone-card']}
              ariaLabel="Phone"
              icon={<IconPhone />}
              title="Phone"
              text={
                <div>
                  <a href="tel:+919876543210" className="link">+91 98765 43210</a>
                  <br />
                  <a href="tel:+918765432109" className="link">+91 87654 32109</a>
                </div>
              }
            />

            <ContactCard
              ref={(el) => (cardRefs.current[2] = el)}
              id="email-card"
              isVisible={isVisible['email-card']}
              ariaLabel="Email"
              icon={<IconMail />}
              title="Email"
              text={
                <div>
                  <a href="mailto:hello@soarix.in" className="link">hello@soarix.in</a>
                  <br />
                  <a href="mailto:support@soarix.in" className="link">support@soarix.in</a>
                </div>
              }
            />

            <ContactCard
              ref={(el) => (cardRefs.current[3] = el)}
              id="hours-card"
              isVisible={isVisible['hours-card']}
              ariaLabel="Working hours"
              icon={<IconClock />}
              title="Working Hours"
              text={
                <div>
                  Mon‚ÄìFri: 9:30 AM - 6:30 PM
                  <br />
                  Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
                  <br />
                  Sun: Closed
                </div>
              }
            />
          </section>

          <section className="india-wrap" aria-label="For Indian customers">
            <div className="flag-wrap" aria-hidden>
              <IconIndia />
            </div>
            <div className="india-content">
              <h3 className="india-title">Dedicated Support for Indian Clients</h3>
              <p className="india-text">
                Our multilingual team provides personalized assistance in English, Hindi, Marathi, and other regional languages. 
                We understand the unique business landscape of India and tailor our solutions accordingly.
              </p>
            </div>
          </section>
        </div>
      </main>

      <style jsx>{`
        :root {
          --bg-start: #f8f5f2;
          --bg-end: #fbf8f6;
          --muted: #475569;
          --title: #07103a;
          --accent: #0b61e6;
        }

        .contact-page {
          position: relative;
          min-height: 100vh;
          padding: 80px 20px 60px;
          font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bg-start) 0%, var(--bg-end) 100%);
          color: #0f172a;
          overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        .gradient-overlay {
          position: absolute;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          background: radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, rgba(59,130,246,0.08) 0%, transparent 40%),
                      radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, rgba(59,130,246,0.05) 0%, transparent 40%);
          pointer-events: none;
          z-index: 0;
        }

        .content-wrapper {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 1;
          max-width: 1200px;
          margin: 0 auto;
          width: 100%;
        }

        .contact-header {
          text-align: center;
          margin-bottom: 50px;
          padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .header-content {
          max-width: 700px;
          margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .contact-title {
          font-size: 48px;
          font-weight: 800;
          margin: 0;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, #07103a 0%, #0b61e6 100%);
          -webkit-background-clip: text;
          -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
          background-clip: text;
          letter-spacing: -0.5px;
          line-height: 1.1;
          position: relative;
        }

        .contact-title::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          bottom: -10px;
          left: 50%;
          transform: translateX(-50%);
          width: 80px;
          height: 4px;
          background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #60a5fa);
          border-radius: 2px;
          animation: pulse 2s infinite ease-in-out;
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
          0% { transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
          50% { transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1.05); opacity: 0.8; }
          100% { transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        }

        .contact-sub {
          margin-top: 16px;
          font-size: 18px;
          color: var(--muted);
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .grid-wrap {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
          gap: 32px;
          width: 100%;
          padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .card {
          background: white;
          border-radius: 20px;
          padding: 32px;
          display: flex;
          gap: 24px;
          box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
          transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
          align-items: flex-start;
          position: relative;
          overflow: hidden;
          border: 1px solid rgba(236, 236, 236, 0.6);
          opacity: 0;
          transform: translateY(30px);
        }

        .card.visible {
          opacity: 1;
          transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .card::before {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 4px;
          height: 100%;
          background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #3b82f6, #60a5fa);
          transform: scaleY(0);
          transform-origin: top;
          transition: transform 0.5s ease;
        }

        .card:hover {
          transform: translateY(-8px);
          box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.15);
        }

        .card:hover::before {
          transform: scaleY(1);
        }

        .icon-wrap {
          width: 72px;
          height: 72px;
          border-radius: 18px;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6 0%, #60a5fa 100%);
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.25);
          transition: all 0.3s ease;
          position: relative;
          overflow: hidden;
        }

        .icon-wrap::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: -50%;
          left: -50%;
          width: 200%;
          height: 200%;
          background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
          transform: rotate(45deg);
          animation: shine 3s infinite;
        }

        @keyframes shine {
          0% { transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-100%); }
          100% { transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(100%); }
        }

        .card:hover .icon-wrap {
          transform: scale(1.05) rotate(5deg);
          box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.35);
        }

        .card:hover .icon-wrap svg {
          transform: scale(1.1);
        }

        .card-title {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: 20px;
          font-weight: 700;
          color: var(--title);
          margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        .card-text {
          color: var(--muted);
          line-height: 1.7;
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 500;
        }

        .link {
          color: var(--accent);
          text-decoration: none;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.2s ease;
          position: relative;
          display: inline-block;
        }

        .link::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          bottom: -2px;
          left: 0;
          width: 0;
          height: 1px;
          background: var(--accent);
          transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }

        .link:hover {
          color: #07103a;
          transform: translateX(2px);
        }

        .link:hover::after {
          width: 100%;
        }

        .location-list {
          list-style: none;
          padding: 0;
          margin: 0;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 14px;
        }

        .location-list li {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 12px;
          font-weight: 600;
          color: #0b1220;
          font-size: 16px;
          transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }

        .location-list li:hover {
          transform: translateX(5px);
        }

        .pin {
          width: 20px;
          height: 20px;
          animation: pinFloat 3s ease-in-out infinite;
          filter: drop-shadow(0 2px 4px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3));
        }

        @keyframes pinFloat {
          0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
          50% { transform: translateY(-4px); }
        }

        .india-wrap {
          margin-top: 50px;
          padding: 32px;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8fafc 100%);
          border-radius: 20px;
          display: flex;
          gap: 24px;
          align-items: flex-start;
          box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
          border: 1px solid rgba(236, 236, 236, 0.6);
          position: relative;
          overflow: hidden;
          transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .india-wrap:hover {
          transform: translateY(-5px);
          box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.15);
        }

        .india-wrap::before {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 4px;
          height: 100%;
          background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff9933, #138808);
        }

        .flag-wrap {
          flex: 0 0 auto;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          width: 60px;
          height: 60px;
          border-radius: 12px;
          background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9933 0%, #138808 100%);
          box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 153, 51, 0.3);
          position: relative;
          overflow: hidden;
        }

        .flag-wrap::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: -50%;
          left: -50%;
          width: 200%;
          height: 200%;
          background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
          transform: rotate(45deg);
          animation: flagShine 3s infinite;
        }

        @keyframes flagShine {
          0% { transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-100%); }
          100% { transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(100%); }
        }

        .india-title {
          margin: 0 0 12px 0;
          color: var(--accent);
          font-size: 20px;
          font-weight: 700;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 10px;
          position: relative;
        }

        .india-title::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          bottom: -5px;
          left: 0;
          width: 30px;
          height: 3px;
          background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #60a5fa);
          border-radius: 2px;
        }

        .india-text {
          margin: 0;
          color: var(--muted);
          font-size: 16px;
          line-height: 1.7;
          font-weight: 500;
        }

        /* small animation delays for subtle entrance */
        .card { animation: appearUp 520ms cubic-bezier(.2,.9,.3,1) forwards; }
        .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(1){ animation-delay: 0.06s; }
        .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(2){ animation-delay: 0.16s; }
        .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(3){ animation-delay: 0.26s; }
        .grid-wrap .card:nth-child(4){ animation-delay: 0.36s; }

        @keyframes appearUp {
          to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0) scale(1); }
        }

        /* accessibility: respect reduced motion */
        .reduce-motion .card, .reduce-motion .pin { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
          .contact-page { padding: 60px 16px 40px; }
          .contact-title { font-size: 36px; }
          .contact-sub { font-size: 16px; }

          .icon-wrap { width: 60px; height: 60px; }
          .india-wrap { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; text-align: left; padding: 24px; }
          .flag-wrap { width: 50px; height: 50px; }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
          .contact-title { font-size: 28px; }
          .card-title { font-size: 18px; }
          .card-text { font-size: 15px; }
        }
      `}</style>

auditmodel.js :- import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; 
import { supabase } from "../lib/supabaseClient"

/**
 * Audit modal (final version)
 * - Strict email acceptance: popular providers OR company/edu/gov domains (TLD whitelist)
 * - Phone: +91 visual prefix, input stores only 10 digits
 * - On success: "Thank you for visiting" toast -> then "(We will reach you shortly)" for 5s
 */

const POPULAR_PROVIDERS = [
  "gmail.com",
  "yahoo.com",
  "ymail.com",
  "outlook.com",
  "hotmail.com",
  "live.com",
  "icloud.com",
  "protonmail.com",
  "zoho.com",
  "gmx.com",
  "yandex.com",
  "mail.com"
];

const ALLOWED_TLDS = [
  "com", "net", "org", "in", "co", "io", "edu", "gov", "mil", "biz", "info", "tech", "ai", "app"
];

// exact domains you want to block (lowercase)
const BLOCKED_DOMAINS_EXACT = [
  "text.com",
  "yt.com",
  "abc.com",
  "example.com"
];

// pattern-based blocks (keeps earlier checks too)
const BLOCKED_DOMAIN_PATTERNS = ["example.", "test.", "placeholder.", "local.", "invalid.","trial","Try","try"];


function isTldAllowed(domain) {
  const parts = domain.toLowerCase().split(".");
  if (parts.length < 2) return false;
  const tld = parts[parts.length - 1];
  return ALLOWED_TLDS.includes(tld);
}

function isBlockedDomain(domain) {
  if (!domain) return false;
  const d = domain.toLowerCase();
  // exact match or subdomain check
  for (const bad of BLOCKED_DOMAINS_EXACT) {
    if (d === bad || d.endsWith("." + bad)) return true;
  }
  // pattern checks
  return BLOCKED_DOMAIN_PATTERNS.some(p => d.includes(p));
}

function isEmailAcceptable(email) {
  if (!email || typeof email !== "string") return { ok: false, msg: "Please enter an email address." };
  const basic = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  if (!basic.test(email)) return { ok: false, msg: "Please enter a valid email address." };

  const domain = email.split("@")[1].toLowerCase();

  if (isBlockedDomain(domain)) {
    return { ok: false, msg: "Please use a real company, education, government or well-known provider email." };
  }

  if (POPULAR_PROVIDERS.includes(domain)) {
    return { ok: true };
  }

  if (isTldAllowed(domain)) {
    // likely a company/edu/gov domain
    return { ok: true };
  }

  return { ok: false, msg: "Please use a professional or valid provider email (e.g. name@company.com or name@gmail.com)." };
}

export default function AuditModal({ open = false, onClose = () => {} }) {
  const [name, setName] = useState("");
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); // digits only, max 10
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState("");

  const [emailErr, setEmailErr] = useState("");
  const [phoneErr, setPhoneErr] = useState("");
  const [nameErr, setNameErr] = useState("");
  const [submitErr, setSubmitErr] = useState("");

  const [sending, setSending] = useState(false);
  const [showThankYou, setShowThankYou] = useState(false);
  const [showFollowUp, setShowFollowUp] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!open) {
      // clear errors on close
      setEmailErr(""); setPhoneErr(""); setNameErr(""); setSubmitErr("");
    }
  }, [open]);

  // Live validation hooks (optional)
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!email) { setEmailErr(""); return; }
    const res = isEmailAcceptable(email.trim());
    setEmailErr(res.ok ? "" : res.msg);
  }, [email]);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!phone) { setPhoneErr(""); return; }
    if (!/^\d{10}$/.test(phone)) {
      setPhoneErr("Enter a 10-digit phone number (no country code).");
    } else if (/^(\d)\1{9}$/.test(phone)) {
      setPhoneErr("Enter a valid phone number.");
    } else {
      setPhoneErr("");
    }
  }, [phone]);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!name) { setNameErr(""); return; }
    if (name.trim().length < 2) setNameErr("Name is required.");
    else setNameErr("");
  }, [name]);

  function handlePhoneInput(raw) {
    const digits = (raw || "").replace(/\D/g, "");
    // if they pasted +9198... -> keep last 10
    let cleaned = digits;
    if (cleaned.startsWith("91") && cleaned.length > 10) {
      cleaned = cleaned.slice(cleaned.length - 10);
    }
    if (cleaned.length > 10) cleaned = cleaned.slice(0, 10);
    setPhone(cleaned);
  }

  function canSubmit() {
    if (!name.trim()) return false;
    if (!email || emailErr) return false;
    if (!phone || phoneErr) return false;
    return true;
  }

async function handleSubmit(e) {
  e && e.preventDefault();
  setSubmitErr("");

  // ‚úÖ Final checks
  if (!name.trim()) { setNameErr("Name is required."); return; }
  const emailCheck = isEmailAcceptable(email.trim());
  if (!emailCheck.ok) { setEmailErr(emailCheck.msg); return; }
  if (!phone || phone.length !== 10) { setPhoneErr("Enter a 10-digit phone number (no country code)."); return; }

  setSending(true);
  try {
    const payload = {
      name: name.trim(),
      email: email.trim(),
      phone: +91${phone},
      notes: notes.trim()
    };

    await fetch("/api/send-audit", {
  method: "POST",
  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
  body: JSON.stringify(payload),
});


    // ‚úÖ Success flow: first toast, then follow-up
    setShowThankYou(true);
    setTimeout(() => {
      setShowThankYou(false);
      setShowFollowUp(true);
      setTimeout(() => {
        setShowFollowUp(false);
        onClose(); // modal close
      }, 5000); // 5s for (will reach you shortly)
    }, 1500); // 1.5s for Thank you

    // reset fields
    setName(""); setEmail(""); setPhone(""); setNotes("");
  } catch (err) {
    console.error(err);
    setSubmitErr("Something went wrong. Please try again.");
  } finally {
    setSending(false);
  }
}
  if (!open) return null;

  return (
    <>
      {/* backdrop */}
      <div style={styles.backdrop} onClick={onClose}></div>

      {/* modal */}
      <div style={styles.modalWrap} role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
        <button aria-label="Close" style={styles.closeBtn} onClick={onClose}>‚úï</button>
        <h3 style={styles.title}>Book an Audit</h3>

        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={styles.form}>
          <label style={styles.label}>
            Name (required)
            <input
              value={name}
              onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)}
              style={styles.input}
              placeholder="Your full name"
              autoComplete="name"
              required
            />
            {nameErr && <div style={styles.err}>{nameErr}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Email (company/education/gov/provider ‚Äî required)
            <input
              value={email}
              onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)}
              style={styles.input}
              placeholder="name@company.com or name@gmail.com"
              autoComplete="email"
              required
            />
            {emailErr ? <div style={styles.err}>{emailErr}</div> : <div style={styles.hint}>Use a professional or known provider email. Examples: name@company.com, name@university.edu, name@gmail.com</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Phone (required)
            <div style={{ display: "flex", gap: 8, marginTop: 6 }}>
              <span style={styles.prefix}>+91</span>
              <input
                value={phone}
                onChange={(e) => handlePhoneInput(e.target.value)}
                placeholder="9876543210"
                inputMode="tel"
                pattern="[0-9]*"
                autoComplete="tel"
                style={{ ...styles.input, marginTop: 0 }}
                required
              />
            </div>
            {phoneErr && <div style={styles.err}>{phoneErr}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Notes (required)
            <textarea
              value={notes}
              onChange={(e) => setNotes(e.target.value)}
              style={styles.textarea}
              placeholder="Any context we should know..."
            />
          </label>

          {submitErr && <div style={styles.err}>{submitErr}</div>}

          <div style={styles.actions}>
            <button type="button" onClick={onClose} style={styles.btnCancel}>Cancel</button>
            <button type="submit" disabled={!canSubmit() || sending} style={styles.btnPrimary}>
              {sending ? "Sending..." : "Send Request"}
            </button>
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>

      {/* Thank you toast */}
      {showThankYou && (
        <div style={styles.toast}>Thank you for visiting</div>
      )}

      {/* Bracket follow-up (5s) */}
      {showFollowUp && (
        <div style={styles.toast}>(We will reach you shortly)</div>
      )}
    </>
  );
}

// styles
const styles = {
  backdrop: { position: "fixed", inset: 0, background: "rgba(0,0,0,0.6)", zIndex: 2000 },
  modalWrap: { position: "fixed", left: "50%", top: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%,-50%)", width: 420, maxWidth: "94%", background: "#0d1720", color: "#fff", borderRadius: 10, padding: 20, zIndex: 3000, boxShadow: "0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.6)" },

  textarea: { width: "100%", padding: 8, marginTop: 6, borderRadius: 6, minHeight: 90, border: "1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.12)", background: "rgba(255,255,255,0.03)", color: "#fff", resize: "vertical" },
  actions: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "flex-end", gap: 10, marginTop: 12 },
  btnPrimary: { background: "#1787ff", border: 0, color: "#fff", padding: "8px 14px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" },
  btnCancel: { background: "transparent", color: "#ddd", border: "1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08)", padding: "8px 12px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" },
  err: { color: "#ffb3b3", fontSize: 13, marginTop: 6 },

  prefix: { padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 6, background: "rgba(255,255,255,0.03)", color: "white", border: "1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08)", display: "inline-flex", alignItems: "center" },

submit.js:- import { createClient } from "@supabase/supabase-js";
import nodemailer from "nodemailer";

// Supabase client (anon key since RLS policy allows insert)
const supabase = createClient(
  process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL,
  process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
);

const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({
  host: process.env.SMTP_HOST || "smtp.gmail.com",
  port: Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT || 465),
  secure: Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT || 465) === 465, // use numeric check
  auth: {
    user: process.env.SMTP_USER,
    pass: process.env.SMTP_PASS,
  },
});

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== "POST") {
    return res.status(405).json({ error: "Method not allowed" });
  }

  const { name, email, phone, notes, message, source } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: "name and email are required" });
  }

  try {
    // ‚úÖ Generate Indian timestamp (IST)
    const submittedAt = new Date().toLocaleString("en-IN", {
      timeZone: "Asia/Kolkata",
    });

    // 1) Insert into Supabase (include phone + submitted_at)
    const { data, error: dbError } = await supabase
      .from("submissions")
      .insert([
        {
          name,
          email,
          phone,
          message: message || notes || "",
          source: source || "audit-form",
          submitted_at: submittedAt, // ‚úÖ NEW FIELD
        },
      ]);

    if (dbError) {
      console.error("Supabase insert error:", dbError);
      return res
        .status(500)
        .json({ error: "Database insert failed", details: dbError });
    }

    // 2) Send email (best-effort)
    try {
      const mail = {
        from: "Soarix Contact" <${process.env.SMTP_USER}>,
        to: process.env.EMAIL_TO || process.env.SMTP_USER,
        subject: New Audit Request from ${name},
        text: Name: ${name}
Email: ${email}
Phone: ${phone || "N/A"}
Message: ${message || notes || "N/A"}
Source: ${source || "audit-form"}
Submitted At (IST): ${submittedAt}, // ‚úÖ Added timestamp in plain text

        html: <p><strong>Name:</strong> ${name}</p>
               <p><strong>Email:</strong> ${email}</p>
               <p><strong>Phone:</strong> ${phone || "N/A"}</p>
               <p><strong>Message:</strong><br/>${(message || notes || "N/A").replace(/\n/g, "<br/>")}</p>
               <p><strong>Source:</strong> ${source || "audit-form"}</p>
               <p><strong>Submitted At (IST):</strong> ${submittedAt}</p>, // ‚úÖ Added timestamp in HTML email
      };

      await transporter.sendMail(mail);
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error("Email send error (non-fatal):", {
        message: mailErr?.message,
        code: mailErr?.code,
        response: mailErr?.response,
      });
      // continue ‚Äî don't fail the whole request
    }

    return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: data?.[0]?.id || null });
  } catch (err) {
    console.error("Unexpected error in /api/submit:", err);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: "Unexpected server error" });
  }
}

  const secure = port === 465;
  const auth = {
    user: process.env.SMTP_USER,
    pass: process.env.SMTP_PASS,
  };

  // basic validation
  if (!host || !port || !auth.user || !auth.pass) return null;

  const transportOptions = { host, port, secure, auth };
  // prefer TLS for non-465 ports
  if (!secure) transportOptions.requireTLS = true;

  return nodemailer.createTransport(transportOptions);
}

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Method not allowed' });

  const { name, email, phone, notes, message, source } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email) {
    return res.status(400).json({ error: 'name and email are required' });
  }

  // Insert into Supabase
  try {
    const submitted_at = new Date().toISOString();
    const { data, error: dbError } = await supabase.from('submissions').insert([{
      name,
      email,
      phone: phone || null,
      message: message || notes || '',
      source: source || 'audit-form',
      submitted_at,
    }]);

    if (dbError) {
      console.error('Supabase insert error:', dbError);
      // Still try to continue to email if you want, but send error now:
      return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Database insert failed', details: dbError.message || dbError });
    }

    // Prepare email
    const transporter = makeTransport();
    if (!transporter) {
      console.warn('SMTP not configured properly ‚Äî skipping email send.');
      return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: data?.[0]?.id || null, mail: 'skipped' });
    }

    // Verify transporter connection (helpful for debugging)
    try {
      await transporter.verify();
      console.log('SMTP verified OK');
    } catch (verifyErr) {
      console.error('SMTP verify failed:', verifyErr && (verifyErr.message || verifyErr));
      // Still continue but return a debug hint
      return res.status(500).json({ error: 'SMTP verify failed', details: verifyErr?.message || String(verifyErr) });
    }

    const submittedId = data?.[0]?.id ?? null;
    const submittedAtLocal = new Date().toLocaleString('en-IN', { timeZone: 'Asia/Kolkata' });

    const mail = {
      from: `"Soarix Contact" <${process.env.SMTP_USER}>`,
      to: process.env.EMAIL_TO || process.env.SMTP_USER,
      subject: `New Audit Request from ${name}`,
      text: `Name: ${name}
Email: ${email}
Phone: ${phone || 'N/A'}
Message: ${message || notes || 'N/A'}
Source: ${source || 'audit-form'}
Submitted At (IST): ${submittedAtLocal}
Supabase id: ${submittedId}`,
      html: `
        <p><strong>Name:</strong> ${name}</p>
        <p><strong>Email:</strong> ${email}</p>
        <p><strong>Phone:</strong> ${phone || 'N/A'}</p>
        <p><strong>Message:</strong><br/>${(message || notes || 'N/A').replace(/\n/g, '<br/>')}</p>
        <p><strong>Source:</strong> ${source || 'audit-form'}</p>
        <p><strong>Submitted At (IST):</strong> ${submittedAtLocal}</p>
        <p><strong>Supabase id:</strong> ${submittedId}</p>
      `,
    };

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail(mail);
      console.log('Mail sent:', info?.messageId || info);
      return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: submittedId, mailId: info?.messageId || null });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error('Email send error:', mailErr && (mailErr.message || mailErr));
      // Return DB success but mail failure detail
      return res.status(200).json({
        ok: true,
        id: submittedId,
        mail: 'failed',
        mailError: mailErr?.message || String(mailErr)
      });
    }
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('Unexpected error in /api/send-audit:', err);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Unexpected server error', details: err?.message || String(err) });
  }
}

// components/AuditModal.js
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';

const POPULAR_PROVIDERS = [
  "gmail.com","yahoo.com","outlook.com","hotmail.com","live.com","icloud.com","protonmail.com","zoho.com"
];
const ALLOWED_TLDS = ["com","net","org","in","co","io","edu","gov","mil","biz","info","tech","ai","app"];
const BLOCKED_DOMAINS_EXACT = ["example.com","text.com","yt.com"];
const BLOCKED_DOMAIN_PATTERNS = ["example.", "test.", "placeholder.", "local.", "invalid."];

function isTldAllowed(domain){
  const parts = domain.toLowerCase().split('.');
  if(parts.length < 2) return false;
  const tld = parts[parts.length-1];
  return ALLOWED_TLDS.includes(tld);
}
function isBlockedDomain(domain) {
  if(!domain) return false;
  const d = domain.toLowerCase();
  for(const bad of BLOCKED_DOMAINS_EXACT) {
    if(d === bad || d.endsWith('.' + bad)) return true;
  }
  return BLOCKED_DOMAIN_PATTERNS.some(p => d.includes(p));
}
function isEmailAcceptable(email) {
  if(!email) return { ok:false, msg:'Please enter an email address.' };
  const basic = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  if(!basic.test(email)) return { ok:false, msg:'Please enter a valid email address.' };
  const domain = email.split('@')[1].toLowerCase();
  if(isBlockedDomain(domain)) return { ok:false, msg:'Please use a valid company/edu/gov or known provider email.'};
  if(POPULAR_PROVIDERS.includes(domain)) return { ok:true };
  if(isTldAllowed(domain)) return { ok:true };
  return { ok:false, msg:'Please use a professional or valid provider email (e.g. name@company.com).' };
}

export default function AuditModal({ open=false, onClose=()=>{} }) {
  const [name, setName] = useState('');
  const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState(''); // digits only
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState('');

  const [emailErr, setEmailErr] = useState('');
  const [phoneErr, setPhoneErr] = useState('');
  const [nameErr, setNameErr] = useState('');
  const [submitErr, setSubmitErr] = useState('');

  const [sending, setSending] = useState(false);
  const [showThankYou, setShowThankYou] = useState(false);
  const [showFollowUp, setShowFollowUp] = useState(false);

  useEffect(()=> {
    if(!open) {
      setEmailErr(''); setPhoneErr(''); setNameErr(''); setSubmitErr('');
    }
  }, [open]);

  useEffect(()=> {
    if(!email) { setEmailErr(''); return; }
    const res = isEmailAcceptable(email.trim());
    setEmailErr(res.ok ? '' : res.msg);
  }, [email]);

  useEffect(()=> {
    if(!phone) { setPhoneErr(''); return; }
    if(!/^\d{10}$/.test(phone)) setPhoneErr('Enter a 10-digit phone number (no country code).');
    else if(/^(\d)\1{9}$/.test(phone)) setPhoneErr('Enter a valid phone number.');
    else setPhoneErr('');
  }, [phone]);

  useEffect(()=> {
    if(!name) { setNameErr(''); return; }
    if(name.trim().length < 2) setNameErr('Name is required.');
    else setNameErr('');
  }, [name]);

  function handlePhoneInput(raw) {
    let digits = (raw||'').replace(/\D/g,'');
    if(digits.startsWith('91') && digits.length > 10) {
      digits = digits.slice(digits.length - 10);
    }
    if(digits.length > 10) digits = digits.slice(0,10);
    setPhone(digits);
  }

  function canSubmit() {
    if(!name.trim()) return false;
    if(!email || emailErr) return false;
    if(!phone || phoneErr) return false;
    return true;
  }

  async function handleSubmit(e) {
    e && e.preventDefault();
    setSubmitErr('');
    if(!name.trim()) { setNameErr('Name is required.'); return; }
    const emailCheck = isEmailAcceptable(email.trim());
    if(!emailCheck.ok) { setEmailErr(emailCheck.msg); return; }
    if(!phone || phone.length !== 10) { setPhoneErr('Enter a 10-digit phone number (no country code).'); return; }

    setSending(true);
    try {
      const payload = {
        name: name.trim(),
        email: email.trim(),
        phone: `+91${phone}`,
        notes: notes.trim()
      };
      const resp = await fetch('/api/send-audit', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload)
      });
      const json = await resp.json().catch(()=>({}));
      if(!resp.ok) {
        const msg = json?.error || json?.message || 'Server error';
        setSubmitErr(msg + (json?.details ? ` ‚Äî ${json.details}` : ''));
        return;
      }
      // success
      setShowThankYou(true);
      setTimeout(()=> {
        setShowThankYou(false);
        setShowFollowUp(true);
        setTimeout(()=> { setShowFollowUp(false); onClose(); }, 5000);
      }, 1400);
      setName(''); setEmail(''); setPhone(''); setNotes('');
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Network error:', err);
      setSubmitErr('Network error. Please try again later.');
    } finally {
      setSending(false);
    }
  }

  if(!open) return null;

  return (
    <>
      <div style={styles.backdrop} onClick={onClose} />
      <div style={styles.modal} role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
        <button aria-label="Close" style={styles.close} onClick={onClose}>‚úï</button>
        <h3 style={styles.h3}>Book an Audit</h3>

        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={styles.form}>
          <label style={styles.label}>
            Name (required)
            <input style={styles.input} value={name} onChange={(e)=>setName(e.target.value)} required />
            {nameErr && <div style={styles.err}>{nameErr}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Email (required)
            <input style={styles.input} type="email" value={email} onChange={(e)=>setEmail(e.target.value)} required />
            {emailErr ? <div style={styles.err}>{emailErr}</div> : <div style={styles.hint}>Use company or known provider email.</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Phone (required)
            <div style={{display:'flex', gap:8}}>
              <div style={styles.prefix}>+91</div>
              <input style={{...styles.input, marginTop:0}} inputMode="tel" value={phone} onChange={(e)=>handlePhoneInput(e.target.value)} placeholder="9876543210" required />
            </div>
            {phoneErr && <div style={styles.err}>{phoneErr}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Notes
            <textarea style={styles.textarea} value={notes} onChange={(e)=>setNotes(e.target.value)} />
          </label>

          {submitErr && <div style={styles.err}>{submitErr}</div>}

          <div style={{display:'flex', justifyContent:'flex-end', gap:8, marginTop:12}}>
            <button type="button" onClick={onClose} style={styles.btnCancel}>Cancel</button>
            <button type="submit" disabled={!canSubmit() || sending} style={styles.btnPrimary}>{sending ? 'Sending...' : 'Send Request'}</button>
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>

      {showThankYou && <div style={styles.toast}>Thank you ‚Äî request received</div>}
      {showFollowUp && <div style={styles.toast}>(We will reach you shortly)</div>}
    </>
  );
}

const styles = {
  backdrop: { position:'fixed', inset:0, background:'rgba(0,0,0,0.45)', zIndex:2000 },
  modal: { position:'fixed', left:'50%', top:'50%', transform:'translate(-50%,-50%)', width:420, maxWidth:'94%', background:'#fff', color:'#031124', borderRadius:10, padding:20, zIndex:3000, boxShadow:'0 12px 40px rgba(2,6,23,0.2)' },
  close: { position:'absolute', right:12, top:12, background:'transparent', border:0, fontSize:18, cursor:'pointer' },

  label: { display:'block', marginBottom:10, fontSize:14 },
  input: { width:'100%', padding:'10px 12px', marginTop:6, borderRadius:8, border:'1px solid #e6eef8' },
  textarea: { width:'100%', padding:10, marginTop:6, borderRadius:8, minHeight:90, border:'1px solid #e6eef8', resize:'vertical' },
  prefix: { padding:'8px 10px', borderRadius:8, background:'#f4f8ff', border:'1px solid #e6eef8', display:'inline-flex', alignItems:'center' },
  btnPrimary: { background:'#0b61e6', border:0, color:'#fff', padding:'10px 14px', borderRadius:8, cursor:'pointer' },

  err: { color:'#b42525', fontSize:13, marginTop:6 },

  toast: { position:'fixed', bottom:32, left:'50%', transform:'translateX(-50%)', background:'#05243b', color:'#fff', padding:'10px 16px', borderRadius:8, zIndex:4000 }
};

1) components/AuditModal.js (frontend)
Replace your modal component with this (simple, same UX but posts to /api/submit and shows toast). Save as components/AuditModal.js or replace your existing auditmodel.js.

// components/AuditModal.js
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

export default function AuditModal({ open = false, onClose = () => {} }) {
  const [name, setName] = useState("");
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); // digits only
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState("");

  const [errors, setErrors] = useState({});
  const [sending, setSending] = useState(false);
  const [toast, setToast] = useState("");

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!open) {
      setName(""); setEmail(""); setPhone(""); setNotes(""); setErrors({});
    }
  }, [open]);

  function validate() {
    const e = {};
    if (!name.trim()) e.name = "Name is required";
    if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test((email || "").trim())) e.email = "Valid email required";
    if (!/^\d{10}$/.test(phone)) e.phone = "Enter 10 digit phone (no +91)";
    return e;
  }

  async function handleSubmit(ev) {
    ev?.preventDefault();
    const e = validate();
    setErrors(e);
    if (Object.keys(e).length) return;

    setSending(true);
    try {
      const payload = { name: name.trim(), email: email.trim(), phone: `+91${phone}`, notes };
      const resp = await fetch("/api/submit", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload),
      });
      const json = await resp.json().catch(() => ({}));

      if (!resp.ok) {
        console.error("Submit error:", json);
        setToast(json?.error || json?.message || "Submission failed. Try again.");
        setSending(false);
        return;
      }

      setToast("Thanks ‚Äî request received. We'll reach out soon.");
      setTimeout(() => setToast(""), 5000);
      // small success flow
      setName(""); setEmail(""); setPhone(""); setNotes("");
      setSending(false);
      onClose();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error("Network error:", err);
      setToast("Network error. Try again.");
      setSending(false);
    }
  }

  if (!open) return null;

  return (
    <>
      <div style={styles.backdrop} onClick={onClose} />
      <div style={styles.modal} role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
        <button onClick={onClose} style={styles.close}>‚úï</button>
        <h3 style={{marginTop:0}}>Book an Audit</h3>

        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
          <label style={styles.label}>
            Name
            <input value={name} onChange={e=>setName(e.target.value)} style={styles.input} />
            {errors.name && <div style={styles.err}>{errors.name}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Email
            <input value={email} onChange={e=>setEmail(e.target.value)} style={styles.input} />
            {errors.email && <div style={styles.err}>{errors.email}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Phone (10 digits)
            <input value={phone} onChange={e=>setPhone(e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, "").slice(0,10))} style={styles.input} />
            {errors.phone && <div style={styles.err}>{errors.phone}</div>}
          </label>

          <label style={styles.label}>
            Notes (optional)
            <textarea value={notes} onChange={e=>setNotes(e.target.value)} style={styles.textarea} />
          </label>

          <div style={{display:"flex", gap:10, justifyContent:"flex-end", marginTop:12}}>
            <button type="button" onClick={onClose} style={styles.btnSecondary}>Cancel</button>
            <button type="submit" disabled={sending} style={styles.btnPrimary}>{sending ? "Sending..." : "Send Request"}</button>
          </div>
        </form>

        {toast && <div style={styles.toast}>{toast}</div>}
      </div>
    </>
  );
}

const styles = {
  backdrop: { position:"fixed", inset:0, background:"rgba(0,0,0,0.45)", zIndex:2000 },
  modal: { position:"fixed", left:"50%", top:"50%", transform:"translate(-50%,-50%)", zIndex:3000, width:420, maxWidth:"94%", background:"#fff", padding:20, borderRadius:12, boxShadow:"0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)" },
  close: { position:"absolute", right:12, top:10, border:0, background:"transparent", fontSize:18, cursor:"pointer" },
  label: { display:"block", marginBottom:10, fontSize:14 },
  input: { width:"100%", padding:"10px 12px", borderRadius:8, border:"1px solid #e6e9ef", boxSizing:"border-box" },
  textarea: { width:"100%", padding:10, minHeight:90, borderRadius:8, border:"1px solid #e6e9ef", boxSizing:"border-box" },
  err: { color:"#cc3d3d", marginTop:6, fontSize:13 },
  btnPrimary: { background:"#1366ff", color:"#fff", border:0, padding:"8px 14px", borderRadius:8, cursor:"pointer" },
  btnSecondary: { background:"transparent", border:"1px solid #cfd6e4", padding:"8px 12px", borderRadius:8, cursor:"pointer" },
  toast: { marginTop:12, background:"#0b1220", color:"#fff", padding:"8px 12px", borderRadius:8 }
};
2) pages/api/submit.js (server)
Replace your API with this. It uses nodemailer robustly, inserts into Supabase, sets submitted_at IST and logs email errors but still returns success if DB saved.

// pages/api/submit.js
import { createClient } from "@supabase/supabase-js";
import nodemailer from "nodemailer";

// Use the same env names you already have in .env.local
const SUPA_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL;
const SUPA_ANON = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;

const supabase = createClient(SUPA_URL, SUPA_ANON);

// Create transporter lazily and validate config
function createTransporter() {
  const host = process.env.SMTP_HOST;
  const port = Number(process.env.SMTP_PORT || 465);
  const user = process.env.SMTP_USER;
  const pass = process.env.SMTP_PASS;

  if (!host || !user || !pass) return null;

  const secure = port === 465;
  const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({
    host,
    port,
    secure,
    auth: { user, pass },
    tls: { rejectUnauthorized: false }, // tolerate some TLS situations (ok for many SMTP providers)
  });

  return transporter;
}

export default async function handler(req, res) {
  if (req.method !== "POST") return res.status(405).json({ error: "Method not allowed" });

  const { name, email, phone, notes, message, source } = req.body || {};

  if (!name || !email) return res.status(400).json({ error: "name and email required" });

  try {
    const submitted_at = new Date().toLocaleString("en-IN", { timeZone: "Asia/Kolkata" });

    // Insert to Supabase
    const { data, error: dbError } = await supabase
      .from("submissions")
      .insert([{
        name,
        email,
        phone: phone || null,
        message: message || notes || "",
        source: source || "audit-form",
        submitted_at
      }]);

    if (dbError) {
      console.error("DB insert error:", dbError);
      return res.status(500).json({ error: "Database insert failed", details: dbError.message || dbError });
    }

    // Try sending email (best-effort)
    const transporter = createTransporter();
    if (!transporter) {
      console.warn("SMTP not configured, skipping email send.");
      return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: data?.[0]?.id || null, mail: "skipped" });
    }

    // verify transporter (optional - won't throw if fails, but we try)
    try { await transporter.verify(); } catch (vErr) { console.warn("SMTP verify warning:", vErr && vErr.message); }

    const submittedId = data?.[0]?.id || null;
    const mail = {
      from: `"Soarix" <${process.env.SMTP_USER}>`,
      to: process.env.EMAIL_TO || process.env.SMTP_USER,
      subject: `New Audit Request: ${name}`,
      text: `Name: ${name}\nEmail: ${email}\nPhone: ${phone || "N/A"}\nMessage: ${message || notes || "N/A"}\nSource: ${source || "audit-form"}\nSubmitted (IST): ${submitted_at}\nID: ${submittedId}`,
      html: `<p><strong>Name:</strong> ${name}</p>
             <p><strong>Email:</strong> ${email}</p>
             <p><strong>Phone:</strong> ${phone || "N/A"}</p>
             <p><strong>Message:</strong><br/>${(message || notes || "N/A").replace(/\n/g, "<br/>")}</p>
             <p><strong>Submitted (IST):</strong> ${submitted_at}</p>
             <p><strong>ID:</strong> ${submittedId}</p>`
    };

    try {
      const info = await transporter.sendMail(mail);
      console.log("Mail sent:", info && info.messageId);
      return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: submittedId, mailSent: true });
    } catch (mailErr) {
      console.error("Mail send failed (non-fatal):", mailErr && (mailErr.message || mailErr));
      // still respond success because DB saved ‚Äî but tell the client mail failed
      return res.status(200).json({ ok: true, id: submittedId, mailSent: false, mailError: mailErr?.message || String(mailErr) });
    }

  } catch (err) {
    console.error("Unexpected /api/submit error:", err);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: "Server error", details: err?.message || String(err) });
  }
}
Quick SMTP checklist (must follow)
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com

SMTP_PORT=465 (SSL) or 587 (STARTTLS). If 465 ‚Üí secure:true. If 587 ‚Üí secure:false + requireTLS:true. Above code auto-detects by port.

SMTP_USER=youremail@gmail.com

SMTP_PASS=<Gmail app password> (NOT your normal password; create app password if Google 2FA enabled)

EMAIL_TO=where-you-want-inbox@example.com

Restart Next dev server after .env.local changes.

If you used SMTP_PORT=587 and secure:true, mails will fail ‚Äî so ensure correct port/secure combo.

Why mail didn‚Äôt come (most common reasons)
SMTP credentials wrong / app password not used (Gmail rejects).

Wrong port/secure mismatch.

Your hosting (if deployed) blocks outbound SMTP (rare on Vercel) ‚Äî check provider docs.

FROM or TO invalid or blocked by provider (use same domain/email).

nodemailer not set up to accept TLS ‚Äî above code tolerates rejectUnauthorized=false (helps some providers).

Quick pre-push checklist (run these)
See working-tree status (which files changed / staged / untracked)

git status --short

git status
See unstaged changes (what will be added if you git add them)

git diff
See staged changes (what is ready to be committed)

git diff --staged
Show the full list of changed files (both staged & unstaged)

git ls-files -m      # modified tracked
git ls-files --others --exclude-standard   # untracked
# combine
git status --porcelain | sed -n 's/^.. //p'
Inspect file-by-file diffs (open each file diff)

git diff -- myfile.js        # unstaged diff for a file
git diff --staged -- myfile.js   # staged diff for a file
Review what you‚Äôve already committed locally but not pushed

# assuming remote branch is origin/main (replace if different)
git fetch origin
git log --oneline --graph --decorate origin/main..HEAD
# to view full commits with details:
git log origin/main..HEAD --stat
See exactly what changed in the most recent commit

git show --stat HEAD
git show HEAD    # full patch
Review commit history (recent commits)

git log --oneline -n 10
git log --pretty=format:"%h %ad | %s%d [%an]" --date=short -n 10
If you want to interactively stage only parts of files

git add -p
If you need to unstage something you staged by mistake

git reset -- <file>       # unstage file but keep edits in working tree
# or to unstage all staged:
git reset
If you want to undo local changes (be careful ‚Äî destructive)

git checkout -- <file>    # discard unstaged changes in file
git restore <file>        # newer git equivalent (non-destructive compared to checkout)
# to discard ALL unstaged changes:
git restore .
# to remove all untracked files:
git clean -n    # dry run
git clean -f    # remove files
If you want to amend last commit (add files or fix message)

# stage changes first then:
git commit --amend --no-edit   # amend without editing message
# or
git commit --amend              # opens editor to change message
Check remote and current branch before pushing

git branch --show-current
git remote -v
Push to remote (safe way ‚Äî only push if you reviewed everything)

# common push:
git push origin HEAD

# if pushing to a specific branch:
git push origin my-branch-name

# if you amended commits and already pushed earlier, you'll need force-with-lease:
git push --force-with-lease origin my-branch-name
# <--- only use if you understand the consequences
Recommended quick workflow before push
git status ‚Äî confirm files changed.

git add -p ‚Äî interactively add only intended hunks.

git commit -m "Short descriptive message" ‚Äî commit.

git log --oneline origin/main..HEAD ‚Äî check if you have unpushed commits.

git show --stat HEAD ‚Äî quick review of last commit.

git push origin <branch> ‚Äî push.

Useful tips & checks
To see what will be pushed (commits on your branch not on remote):

git log --oneline origin/$(git branch --show-current)..HEAD
If you want a GUI-ish diff: git difftool (if configured), or use VSCode:

code .
# then use Source Control panel to review & stage hunks visually
If you accidentally committed secrets (passwords / keys), do not push. Remove them, rotate the secret, and use git rebase -i / git filter-repo to remove from history before pushing.

If you‚Äôre collaborating and someone else pushed while you were working, run git pull --rebase to rebase your work onto latest remote before pushing.

                          </div>
                          <div>
                            <button className="soarix-plan-btn small" onClick={() => onAddItem(svc)}>Add</button>
                          </div>
                        </li>
                      );
                    })}
                  </ul>

                  <div style={{ marginTop: 12, display: "flex", gap: 10 }}>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-btn primary" onClick={() => onAddPackage(payload.data)}>Add whole package</button>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline" onClick={onClose}>Close</button>
                  </div>
                </>
              ) : (
                <>
                  <h4 style={{ marginBottom: 8 }}>Details</h4>
                  <p className="soarix-plan-muted">{payload.data.desc}</p>
                  <div style={{ marginTop: 12 }}>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-btn primary" onClick={() => onAddItem(payload.data)}>Add to plan</button>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline" style={{ marginLeft: 8 }} onClick={onClose}>Close</button>
                  </div>
                </>
              )}
            </div>
          </motion.div>
        </motion.div>
      )}
    </AnimatePresence>
  );
}

/* ==========================
   Main Component
   ========================== */
export default function PlanBuilderPage() {
  const [tab, setTab] = useState("preset"); // "preset" | "custom"
  const [selected, setSelected] = useState([]); // {id,name,desc}
  const [customItems, setCustomItems] = useState([]); // custom items added
  const [query, setQuery] = useState("");
  const [suggestOpen, setSuggestOpen] = useState(false);
  const [confirmOpen, setConfirmOpen] = useState(false);
  const [detailsOpen, setDetailsOpen] = useState(false);
  const [detailsPayload, setDetailsPayload] = useState(null);
  const [activePreset, setActivePreset] = useState(null);

  const suggestRef = useRef(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    function onDoc(e) {
      if (suggestRef.current && !suggestRef.current.contains(e.target)) setSuggestOpen(false);
    }
    document.addEventListener("click", onDoc);
    return () => document.removeEventListener("click", onDoc);
  }, []);

  // Combined list for search suggestions
  const allOptions = useMemo(() => {
    const services = SERVICES.map((s) => ({ id: s.id, name: s.name, desc: s.desc, type: "item" }));
    const presets = PRESETS.map((p) => ({ id: preset-${p.id}, name: p.title, desc: p.summary, type: "preset" }));
    const custom = customItems.map((c) => ({ id: c.id, name: c.name, desc: c.desc, type: "custom" }));
    return [...services, ...presets, ...custom];
  }, [customItems]);

  const suggestions = useMemo(() => {
    const q = query.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (!q) return [];
    return allOptions.filter((o) => o.name.toLowerCase().includes(q)).slice(0, 8);
  }, [query, allOptions]);

  const isSelected = (id) => selected.some((s) => s.id === id);

  const addSelected = (item) => {
    if (!item || !item.id) return;
    if (isSelected(item.id)) return;
    setSelected((s) => [...s, { id: item.id, name: item.name, desc: item.desc }]);
  };

  const removeSelected = (id) => setSelected((s) => s.filter((x) => x.id !== id));

  const addCustom = (text) => {
    const t = (text || "").trim();
    if (!t) return;
    const id = uniqueId("custom");
    const item = { id, name: t, desc: "Custom request" };
    setCustomItems((p) => [...p, item]);
    addSelected(item);
    setQuery("");
    setSuggestOpen(false);
  };

  const openDetailsForPreset = (p) => {
    setDetailsPayload({ type: "preset", data: p });
    setDetailsOpen(true);
  };

  const openDetailsForItem = (item) => {
    setDetailsPayload({ type: "item", data: item });
    setDetailsOpen(true);
  };

  const addPackageItems = (preset) => {
    preset.items.forEach((id) => {
      const svc = findService(id);
      if (svc) addSelected(svc);
    });
    setDetailsOpen(false);
    setDetailsPayload(null);
    setActivePreset(null);
  };

  // Request rules
  const hasPredefined = selected.some((s) => SERVICES.some((svc) => svc.id === s.id));
  const allowRequest = selected.length > 0 && (hasPredefined ? selected.length >= 1 : selected.length >= 2);

  const requestProposal = () => {
    if (!allowRequest) {
      if (hasPredefined) alert("Please add at least one service or item before requesting a proposal.");
      else alert("Custom-only plans require at least 2 items.");
      return;
    }
    // open mailto or submit to API (placeholder)
    const body = selected.map((s) => - ${s.name}).join("\n");
    const subj = encodeURIComponent("Soarix ‚Äî Plan Request");
    const b = encodeURIComponent(Please send proposal for:\n\n${body});
    window.location.href = mailto:hello@soarix.example?subject=${subj}&body=${b};
  };

  const clearAllConfirmed = () => {
    setSelected([]);
    setCustomItems([]);
    setConfirmOpen(false);
    setDetailsOpen(false);
    setDetailsPayload(null);
    setActivePreset(null);
  };

  return (
    <div className="soarix-plan-root">
      <header className="soarix-plan-hero">
        <h1>Build Your Plan Customise & Request Proposal</h1>
        <p className="soarix-plan-muted">Pick a preset, choose single items (logo, SEO...) or add custom pieces. Fully custom plans require minimum 2 items.</p>
      </header>

      <main className="soarix-plan-wrap">
        <section className="soarix-plan-left">
          <div className="soarix-plan-tabs">
            <button className={tab ${tab === "preset" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setTab("preset")}>Preset Packages</button>
            <button className={tab ${tab === "custom" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setTab("custom")}>Custom Builder</button>
          </div>

          {/* PRESET VIEW */}
          {tab === "preset" && (
            <div className="soarix-plan-presets">
              {PRESETS.map((p) => {
                const applied = p.items.every((id) => isSelected(id));
                return (
                  <article key={p.id} className={preset-card ${applied ? "applied" : ""}}>
                    <div className="preset-info" onClick={() => { setActivePreset(p); openDetailsForPreset(p); }}>
                      <h3>{p.title}</h3>
                      <p className="soarix-plan-muted">{p.summary}</p>
                    </div>
                    <div className="preset-actions">
                      <div className="preset-pill">{p.items.length} items</div>
                      <button className="preset-open" onClick={() => openDetailsForPreset(p)} aria-label="Open preset">‚ñ∂</button>
                      {applied && <div className="preset-tick">‚úì</div>}
                    </div>
                  </article>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          )}

          {/* CUSTOM VIEW */}
          {tab === "custom" && (
            <>
              <h2 className="soarix-plan-subtitle">Available Services</h2>

              <div className="soarix-plan-grid">
                {SERVICES.map((s) => (
                  <div key={s.id} className={service-card ${isSelected(s.id) ? "selected" : ""}}>
                    <div className="service-left" onClick={() => openDetailsForItem(s)} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
                      <strong>{s.name}</strong>
                      <div className="soarix-plan-muted" style={{ marginTop: 6 }}>{s.desc}</div>
                    </div>
                    <div className="service-right">
                      <button className={btn ${isSelected(s.id) ? "selected-btn" : ""}} onClick={() => (isSelected(s.id) ? removeSelected(s.id) : addSelected(s))}>
                        {isSelected(s.id) ? "Selected" : "Add"}
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>

              <div style={{ marginTop: 18 }}>
                <h3 style={{ marginBottom: 8 }}>Add or search services</h3>
                <div className="soarix-plan-search" ref={suggestRef}>
                  <input
                    placeholder="Type 'logo', 'seo' or a package name..."
                    value={query}
                    onChange={(e) => { setQuery(e.target.value); setSuggestOpen(e.target.value.trim().length > 0); }}
                    onFocus={() => setSuggestOpen(query.trim().length > 0)}
                    aria-label="Search services"
                  />
                  <button className="soarix-plan-btn small" onClick={() => addCustom(query)}>+ Add</button>

                  <AnimatePresence>
                    {suggestOpen && suggestions.length > 0 && (
                      <motion.ul className="soarix-plan-suggestions" initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -6 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0 }}>
                        {suggestions.map((s) => (
                          <li key={s.id} onClick={() => {
                            setSuggestOpen(false);
                            setQuery("");
                            if (s.type === "preset") {
                              const pid = s.id.replace("preset-", "");
                              const p = PRESETS.find(x => x.id === pid);
                              if (p) openDetailsForPreset(p);
                            } else {
                              const item = SERVICES.find(x => x.id === s.id) || customItems.find(c => c.id === s.id);
                              if (item) openDetailsForItem(item);
                            }
                          }}>
                            <div>
                              <strong>{s.name}</strong>
                              <div className="soarix-plan-muted small">{s.type === "preset" ? "Package" : s.type}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div className="soarix-plan-suggestion-type">{s.type === "preset" ? "Package" : "Item"}</div>
                          </li>
                        ))}
                      </motion.ul>
                    )}
                  </AnimatePresence>
                </div>

                {customItems.length > 0 && (
                  <div style={{ marginTop: 12 }}>
                    <h4 style={{ marginBottom: 8 }}>Your custom items</h4>
                    {customItems.map((c) => (
                      <div key={c.id} className="custom-row">
                        <div>
                          <strong>{c.name}</strong>
                          <div className="soarix-plan-muted small">{c.desc}</div>
                        </div>
                        <div style={{ display: "flex", gap: 8 }}>
                          <button className="soarix-plan-btn small" onClick={() => addSelected(c)}>Add</button>
                          <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline small" onClick={() => setCustomItems((p) => p.filter(x => x.id !== c.id))}>Remove</button>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </>
          )}
        </section>

        {/* RIGHT: Plan summary */}
        <aside className="soarix-plan-right">
          <div className="soarix-plan-summary">
            <h3>Plan Summary</h3>

            {selected.length === 0 ? (
              <p className="soarix-plan-muted">No items added yet pick services, single items or presets from the left.</p>
            ) : (
              <div className="soarix-plan-summary-list">
                {selected.map((s) => (
                  <div key={s.id} className="soarix-plan-summary-row">
                    <div>
                      <strong>{s.name}</strong>
                      <div className="soarix-plan-muted small">{s.desc}</div>
                    </div>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-icon remove" onClick={() => removeSelected(s.id)}>‚úï</button>
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}

            <div style={{ marginTop: 12, display: "flex", gap: 10 }}>
              <button className="soarix-plan-btn primary" onClick={requestProposal} disabled={!allowRequest} title={!allowRequest ? "Add required items first" : "Request proposal"}>Request Proposal</button>
              <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline" onClick={() => setConfirmOpen(true)}>Clear All</button>
            </div>

            <p className="soarix-plan-muted small" style={{ marginTop: 12 }}>
              <strong>Note:</strong> Fully custom plans (only custom items) require minimum 2 items. If you add any predefined/atomic item, 1 item is sufficient.
            </p>
          </div>
        </aside>
      </main>

      {/* Modals */}
      <ConfirmModal open={confirmOpen} onClose={() => setConfirmOpen(false)} onConfirm={clearAllConfirmed} />

      <DetailsModal
        open={detailsOpen}
        payload={detailsPayload}
        onClose={() => { setDetailsOpen(false); setDetailsPayload(null); }}
        onAddItem={(d) => { addSelected(d); setDetailsOpen(false); }}
        onAddPackage={(p) => addPackageItems(p)}
      />

      {/* Active preset quick open (redundant if modal used) */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {activePreset && false && ( /* left intentionally false ‚Äî we use details modal instead */ null)}
      </AnimatePresence>

      <style jsx>{
        /* Root + layout */
        .soarix-plan-root { font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Arial; color:#071428; background: linear-gradient(180deg,#fff,#f6f0ea); min-height:100vh; padding-bottom:60px; }
        .soarix-plan-hero { text-align:center; padding:28px 18px; border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); }
        .soarix-plan-hero h1 { margin:0; font-size:26px; font-weight:800; }
        .soarix-plan-muted { color:#68707a; margin:0; font-size:14px; }
        .soarix-plan-wrap { max-width:1200px; margin:22px auto; padding:20px; display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 360px; gap:22px; align-items:start; }

        /* Tabs */
        .soarix-plan-tabs { display:flex; gap:10px; margin-bottom:16px; }
        .soarix-plan-tabs .tab { padding:8px 12px; border-radius:999px; border:1px solid rgba(7,20,40,0.06); background:transparent; cursor:pointer; font-weight:700; }
        .soarix-plan-tabs .tab.active { background:linear-gradient(180deg,#0b6bff,#0a5ce6); color:#fff; box-shadow:0 10px 30px rgba(11,107,255,0.12); }

        /* Presets grid */
        .soarix-plan-presets { display:grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit,minmax(260px,1fr)); gap:14px; }

        .preset-tick { background:linear-gradient(180deg,#e8f8ff,#e0f2ff); color:#0b6bff; padding:8px; border-radius:8px; font-weight:700; }

        /* Services grid */
        .soarix-plan-grid { display:grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit,minmax(320px,1fr)); gap:14px; margin-top:8px; }
        .service-card { display:flex; justify-content:space-between; gap:12px; align-items:center; background:#fff; padding:14px; border-radius:12px; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); box-shadow:0 10px 28px rgba(6,10,18,0.04); }
        .service-card.selected { outline:2px solid rgba(11,107,255,0.08); box-shadow:0 14px 40px rgba(6,10,18,0.06); }

        .service-right .btn.selected-btn { background:#eef6ff; color:#0b6bff; box-shadow:none; }

        /* Search area */
        .soarix-plan-search { position:relative; margin-top:10px; display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center; background:rgba(255,255,255,0.94); padding:10px; border-radius:12px; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); }

        .soarix-plan-suggestions li { display:flex; justify-content:space-between; gap:12px; padding:10px; border-radius:8px; cursor:pointer; }
        .soarix-plan-suggestions li:hover { background:#f3f7ff; }

        /* Custom list */
        .custom-row { display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center; background:#fff; padding:10px; border-radius:10px; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); margin-bottom:8px; }

        .soarix-plan-right { position: sticky; top:28px; align-self:start; }
        .soarix-plan-summary { background:#fff; padding:16px; border-radius:12px; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); box-shadow:0 18px 48px rgba(6,10,18,0.06); }
        .soarix-plan-summary-list { margin-top:10px; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:10px; max-height:420px; overflow:auto; padding-right:6px; }
        .soarix-plan-summary-row { display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center; background:linear-gradient(180deg,#fff,#fbfbff); padding:10px; border-radius:10px; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.03); }
        .soarix-plan-icon { background:transparent; border:0; cursor:pointer; padding:6px 8px; color:#264653; font-weight:700; border-radius:8px; }

        /* Buttons shared */
        .soarix-plan-btn { padding:10px 14px; border-radius:10px; border:0; cursor:pointer; font-weight:800; }
        .soarix-plan-btn.primary { background:linear-gradient(180deg,#0b6bff,#0a5ce6); color:#fff; box-shadow:0 10px 30px rgba(11,107,255,0.12); }
        .soarix-plan-btn.outline { background:transparent; border:1px solid rgba(7,20,40,0.06); color:#071428; }
        .soarix-plan-btn.small { padding:8px 10px; border-radius:8px; font-weight:700; }
        .soarix-plan-btn.danger { background:linear-gradient(180deg,#e23b3b,#c42b2b); color:#fff; }

        /* Overlay + modal (center) */
        .soarix-plan-overlay { position: fixed !important; inset: 0 !important; display:flex !important; align-items:center !important; justify-content:center !important; z-index:9999 !important; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.45) !important; -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(6px) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(6px) !important; }
        .soarix-plan-modal { width: min(420px, 94%); background: rgba(255,255,255,0.98); border-radius:12px; padding:18px; box-shadow:0 30px 80px rgba(8,10,20,0.46); text-align:center; }
        .soarix-plan-modal-title { margin:0; font-weight:800; color:#071428; }
        .soarix-plan-details { width: min(760px, 96%); background: linear-gradient(180deg,#fff,#fbfbff); border-radius:12px; padding:18px; box-shadow:0 30px 90px rgba(6,10,18,0.28); max-height:86vh; overflow:auto; }

        .soarix-plan-icon.remove { background: transparent; border: 0; color: #9aa4b2; cursor:pointer; font-size:14px; }

        /* small helper classes */
        .small { font-size:12px; }
        .soarix-plan-muted.small { font-size:12px; color:#7b8790; }

        @media (max-width: 980px) {
          .soarix-plan-wrap { grid-template-columns: 1fr; padding:16px; }
          .soarix-plan-right { position: static; margin-top:18px; }
          .soarix-plan-suggestions { position: static; top: auto; left: auto; right: auto; margin-top:8px; }
          .soarix-plan-details { width: 96%; }
        }
      }</style>
    </div>
  );
}

// pages/plan-builder.js
"use client";

import React, { useMemo, useState } from "react";

/**
 * Simplified Soarix ‚Äî Services-only Plan Builder
 * - Removed presets / tabs / complex builder
 * - Shows SERVICES list with Add / Remove
 * - Sticky summary on desktop
 * - Uses same class prefix: soarix-plan-
 */

const SERVICES = [
  { id: "website", name: "Website Development", desc: "Landing / multi-page site, SEO-ready" },
  { id: "branding", name: "Branding Kit", desc: "Logo, guidelines & templates" },
  { id: "logo", name: "Logo Design", desc: "Unique professional logo" },
  { id: "seo", name: "SEO Setup", desc: "On-page SEO & optimisation" },
  { id: "social", name: "Social Media Setup", desc: "Profiles, calendar & auto-post" },
  { id: "ads", name: "Paid Ads Management", desc: "Google / Meta campaigns" },
  { id: "video", name: "Video & Motion", desc: "Reels, shorts & edits" },
  { id: "analytics", name: "Analytics & AI Growth", desc: "Dashboards & optimisation" },
];

const uniqueId = (prefix = "c") => `${prefix}-${Date.now()}-${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000)}`;

export default function PlanBuilderPage() {
  const [selected, setSelected] = useState([]); // array of service ids + custom entries
  const [customItems, setCustomItems] = useState([]);
  const [customText, setCustomText] = useState("");

  const isSelected = (id) => selected.some((s) => s.id === id);
  const addSelected = (item) => {
    if (!item || !item.id) return;
    if (isSelected(item.id)) return;
    setSelected((s) => [...s, { id: item.id, name: item.name, desc: item.desc }]);
  };
  const removeSelected = (id) => setSelected((s) => s.filter((x) => x.id !== id));

  const addCustom = () => {
    const t = (customText || "").trim();
    if (!t) return;
    const id = uniqueId("custom");
    const item = { id, name: t, desc: "Custom request" };
    setCustomItems((p) => [...p, item]);
    addSelected(item);
    setCustomText("");
  };

  const requestProposal = () => {
    if (selected.length === 0) {
      alert("Please add at least one service to request a proposal.");
      return;
    }
    const body = selected.map((s) => `- ${s.name}`).join("\n");
    const subj = encodeURIComponent("Soarix ‚Äî Service Request");
    const b = encodeURIComponent(`Please send a proposal for:\n\n${body}`);
    window.location.href = `mailto:hello@soarix.example?subject=${subj}&body=${b}`;
  };

  const clearAll = () => {
    setSelected([]);
    setCustomItems([]);
  };

  const servicesList = useMemo(() => SERVICES, []);

  return (
    <div className="soarix-plan-root">
      <header className="soarix-plan-hero">
        <h1>Our Services</h1>
        <p className="soarix-plan-muted">Choose from our core services below. Add items to the plan summary and request a proposal.</p>
      </header>

      <main className="soarix-plan-wrap">
        <section className="soarix-plan-left">
          <h2 className="section-title">Available Services</h2>

          <div className="soarix-plan-grid">
            {servicesList.map((s) => (
              <article key={s.id} className={`service-card ${isSelected(s.id) ? "selected" : ""}`}>
                <div className="service-left" onClick={() => addSelected(s)} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
                  <strong>{s.name}</strong>
                  <div className="soarix-plan-muted" style={{ marginTop: 6 }}>{s.desc}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="service-right">
                  <button
                    className={`btn ${isSelected(s.id) ? "selected-btn" : ""}`}
                    onClick={() => (isSelected(s.id) ? removeSelected(s.id) : addSelected(s))}
                  >
                    {isSelected(s.id) ? "Remove" : "Add"}
                  </button>
                </div>
              </article>
            ))}
          </div>

          <div style={{ marginTop: 20 }}>
            <h3>Add a custom service</h3>
            <div className="custom-add">
              <input
                aria-label="Custom service"
                placeholder="Describe custom service (e.g. 'Local PR outreach')"
                value={customText}
                onChange={(e) => setCustomText(e.target.value)}

              <button className="soarix-plan-btn small" onClick={addCustom}>+ Add</button>
            </div>

                {customItems.map((c) => (

                      <div className="soarix-plan-muted small">{c.desc}</div>
                    </div>
                    <div style={{ display: "flex", gap: 8 }}>
                      <button className="soarix-plan-btn small" onClick={() => addSelected(c)}>Add</button>
                      <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline small" onClick={() => {
                        setCustomItems((p) => p.filter(x => x.id !== c.id));
                        removeSelected(c.id);
                      }}>Remove</button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </section>

        <aside className="soarix-plan-right">
          <div className="soarix-plan-summary">
            <h3>Plan Summary</h3>

            {selected.length === 0 ? (
              <p className="soarix-plan-muted">No items added yet ‚Äî add services from the left.</p>
            ) : (
              <div className="soarix-plan-summary-list">
                {selected.map((s) => (
                  <div key={s.id} className="soarix-plan-summary-row">
                    <div>
                      <strong>{s.name}</strong>
                      <div className="soarix-plan-muted small">{s.desc}</div>
                    </div>
                    <button className="soarix-plan-icon remove" onClick={() => removeSelected(s.id)}>‚úï</button>
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}

            <div style={{ marginTop: 12, display: "flex", gap: 10 }}>
              <button className="soarix-plan-btn primary" onClick={requestProposal} disabled={selected.length === 0}>
                Request Proposal
              </button>
              <button className="soarix-plan-btn outline" onClick={clearAll}>Clear All</button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </aside>
      </main>
