    background: "#fff",
    boxShadow: "0 8px 28px rgba(6,10,18,0.06)",
    textAlign: "left",
  },
  muted: {
    color: "#6b7280",
    marginTop: 8,
    fontSize: 13,
  },
};
Notes:

backgroundImage main maine /hero-bg.jpg use kiya ‚Äî tumhara project me jo hero image hai uska path daal do (ya hata do agar simple color chahiye).

Link href="/book-audit" ‚Äî agar tumhara audit modal route alag hai (/audit ya modal) to woh URL update kar lena.

2) Navbar: jaha Build Your Plan link ho, ise hata do
components/Navbar.js me jaha link ho waisa kuch hoga. Replace karo ya comment kar do:

- <Link href="/plan-builder"><a className="nav-link">Build Your Plan</a></Link>
+ {/* Build Your Plan removed as per new design */}
Agar tum chaho toh pura snippet bhi bhej sakta hoon agar Navbar.js dikhado.

3) Agar pages/plan-builder.js file delete karna ho (optional)
Terminal me ye commands run karo:

# remove file from repo (and stage deletion)
git rm pages/plan-builder.js

# stage remaining edits (index, navbar etc.)
git add pages/index.js components/Navbar.js

git commit -m "Remove Build Your Plan CTA; keep only Book a Free Growth Audit; delete plan-builder page"
git push origin main
Agar tum sirf commit karna chahte ho bina file delete kiye, to git add kar ke commit karo ‚Äî but agar tum file ko repo se hatana chahte ho to git rm zaruri hai.

4) Quick testing checklist (jaldi se dekh lo)
npm run dev chalakar local open karo.

Hero me sirf Book a Free Growth Audit button dikhega ‚Äî Build Your Plan nahi.

Navbar me koi bhi Build Your Plan link nahi hona chahiye (search: Ctrl+Shift+F "Build Your Plan").

Agar book-audit route missing ho to pehle create kar lo ya button ko modal trigger pe point kara lo.

Agar chahiye to main ab Navbar.js ka exact updated content bhi bata doon (agar tum components/Navbar.js ka code paste kar doonga to main directly edit karke ready-to-replace version bhej dunga). Ya phir agar tum chahte ho main pages/index.js me Book a Free Growth Audit ko modal open karne wala bana doon (client-side), woh bhi bana dunga.

Batao kaunsa chahiye ‚Äî main turant ready code paste kar dunga.

// pages/services.js
"use client";

import React from "react";
import Head from "next/head";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { Sparkles, Users, TrendingUp } from "lucide-react";

/**

 *
 * Overwrite pages/services.js with this file.
 */

const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || "https://your-project.vercel.app";
const HERO_IMAGE = "/Services-BG-1.jpg";
const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + "/services";
const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + "/Services-BG-1.jpg";

const timeframeNoteText =
  "Deliverables above will be delivered within the stated timeframe. Sustainable growth depends on market, channel, and budget.";

const PACKS = [
  {
    id: "starter",
    tag: "Starter",

      "A conversion ready single page plus a single optimised social profile to validate demand quickly.",

      "Single page website and one optimised social profile that captures leads and validates demand.",
    timeframe: "7‚Äì14 days",
    timeframeNote: timeframeNoteText,
    expected: "First measurable leads within 30 days",
    idealFor: "Solopreneurs, freelancers, micro businesses",
    deliverables: [

  },
  {
    id: "visibility",
    tag: "Popular",

      "A repeatable 30 day content engine plus local discoverability setup to raise impressions and inbound enquiries.",
    outcome:
      "Repeatable 30 day content rhythm and local optimisations that increase reach and consistent inbound interest.",
    timeframe: "Monthly cadence (first 30 day plan delivered)",
    timeframeNote: timeframeNoteText,
    expected: "Improved reach & steady lead inflow after month 1",
    idealFor: "Local businesses and early-stage consumer brands",
    deliverables: [
      "30 day content calendar (Notion) ready to publish",
      "Daily posts + weekly short reels",
      "Google Business Profile setup",
      "Weekly performance snapshot",
    ],
    cta: { text: "Book a Free Growth Audit", href: "/contact" },
    icon: <TrendingUp className="icon" />,
  },
  {
    id: "growth",
    tag: "Recommended",
    title: "Growth Scale & Convert",
    desc:
      "Performance-first funnels, creative testing and CRO to convert traffic into predictable customers.",
    outcome:
      "Data driven ad funnels and CRO loops that reduce CAC and scale acquisition more predictably.",
    timeframe: "60‚Äì90 days setup, then iterative optimisation",
    timeframeNote: timeframeNoteText,
    expected: "Scalable lead gen with measurable conversion uplift",
    idealFor: "SMEs and product brands ready to scale acquisition",
    deliverables: [
      "Multi page website (conversion first)",
      "Ads funnel setup (Meta + Google) + tracking",
      "CRO plan + 2 A/B tests",
      "Video microcontent (4‚Äì6 cuts/month)",
    ],
    cta: { text: "Book a Free Growth Audit", href: "/contact" },
    icon: <Users className="icon" />,
  },
  {
    id: "premium",
    tag: "Enterprise",
    title: "Premium 360¬∞ AI Branding & Growth",
    desc:
      "End-to-end brand & growth engine: identity, site, high-frequency creative, paid channels and automation for leadership.",
    outcome:
      "A fully integrated growth engine ‚Äî brand, website, creative, paid channels and automation ‚Äî for sustained leadership.",
    timeframe: "90+ day strategic roadmap & execution",
    timeframeNote: timeframeNoteText,
    expected: "Cross channel attribution & sustained growth velocity",
    idealFor: "Established companies seeking predictable scaled growth",
    deliverables: [
      "Brand guidelines & visual system",
      "Full website + blog + analytics & CRO",
      "AI automation + reporting stack",
      "Influencer/marketplace activation plan",
    ],
    cta: { text: "Book a Free Growth Audit", href: "/contact" },
    icon: <Sparkles className="icon" />,
  },
];

export default function ServicesPage() {
  const heroStyle = HERO_IMAGE
    ? {
        backgroundImage: url(${HERO_IMAGE}),
        backgroundSize: "cover",
        backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat",
        backgroundPosition: "center center",
      }
    : {};

  // JSON-LD: ItemList of services for search engines (structured)
  const servicesJsonLd = {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "ItemList",
    "url": PAGE_URL,
    "name": "Soarix Services",
    "itemListElement": PACKS.map((p, idx) => ({
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": idx + 1,
      "item": {
        "@type": "Service",
        "name": p.title,
        "description": p.desc,
        "serviceType": p.tag,
        "url": ${PAGE_URL}#${p.id},
        "provider": {
          "@type": "Organization",
          "name": "Soarix",
          "url": SITE_URL
        }
      }
    }))
  };

  return (
    <div className="page">
      <Head>
        <meta charSet="utf-8" />
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1" />
        <title>Services ‚Äî Soarix | Brand, Websites, Growth & AI</title>
        <meta
          name="description"
          content="Soarix offers brand identity, conversion-first websites, content engines, paid acquisition and AI-powered growth services for startups, SMEs and product brands."
        />
        <meta
          name="keywords"
          content="soarix services, digital agency, branding, website development, seo, growth marketing, ai marketing"
        />
        <link rel="canonical" href={PAGE_URL} />

        {/* OpenGraph */}
        <meta property="og:title" content="Services ‚Äî Soarix | Brand, Websites, Growth & AI" />
        <meta
          property="og:description"
          content="Brand identity, conversion-first websites, content & paid acquisition, and AI-powered optimisation to scale growth."
        />
        <meta property="og:image" content={OG_IMAGE} />
        <meta property="og:url" content={PAGE_URL} />
        <meta property="og:type" content="website" />

        {/* Twitter */}
        <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
        <meta name="twitter:title" content="Services ‚Äî Soarix" />
        <meta
          name="twitter:description"
          content="Brand identity, conversion-first websites, content & paid acquisition, and AI-powered optimisation to scale growth."
        />
        <meta name="twitter:image" content={OG_IMAGE} />

        {/* JSON-LD: page + service list */}
        <script
          type="application/ld+json"
          dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(servicesJsonLd) }}
        />
      </Head>

      {/* HERO */}
      <header className="hero" role="banner">
        {HERO_IMAGE && <div className="hero-bg" style={heroStyle} aria-hidden />}
        <div className="hero-inner">
          <h1 className="title">Services that actually move the needle</h1>
          <p className="subtitle">
            We deliver measurable growth from brand identity and conversion first websites to content,
            paid acquisition and AI-powered optimisation. Pick a clear starting point and we‚Äôll give you a
            30 day action plan tied to KPIs.
          </p>
          <div className="hero-ctas">
            <a className="btn-primary" href="/contact">
              Book a Free Growth Audit
            </a>
            <a className="btn-primary secondary" href="/plan-builder">
              Build Your Plan
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      {/* MAIN */}
      <main className="container" role="main">
        <section className="cards" aria-label="Service packages">
          {PACKS.map((p) => (
            <motion.article
              id={p.id}
              key={p.id}
              whileHover={{ y: -6 }}
              transition={{ type: "spring", damping: 16, stiffness: 200 }}
              className="card"
            >
              <div className="card-layer" aria-hidden />
              <div className="card-grid">
                {/* ICON */}
                <div className="card-icon">
                  <div className="icon-box" aria-hidden>
                    {p.icon}
                  </div>
                </div>

                {/* CONTENT */}
                <div className="card-content">
                  <div className="card-headline">
                    <div className="tag">{p.tag}</div>
                    <h3 className="card-title">{p.title}</h3>
                    <p className="card-desc">{p.desc}</p>
                  </div>

                  {/* Outcome label/value two-column */}
                  <dl className="outcome-grid">
                    <div className="row">
                      <dt>Outcome</dt>
                      <dd>{p.outcome}</dd>
                    </div>
                    <div className="row">
                      <dt>Timeframe</dt>
                      <dd>
                        {p.timeframe}
                        <div className="time-note">{p.timeframeNote}</div>
                      </dd>
                    </div>
                    <div className="row">
                      <dt>Expected results</dt>
                      <dd>{p.expected}</dd>
                    </div>
                    <div className="row">
                      <dt>Ideal for</dt>
                      <dd>{p.idealFor}</dd>
                    </div>
                  </dl>

                  {/* Deliverables (short list) */}
                  <div className="deliverables">
                    <strong>Deliverables</strong>
                    <ul>
                      {p.deliverables.map((d, i) => (
                        <li key={i}>{d}</li>
                      ))}
                    </ul>
                  </div>

                  {/* Footer: CTA aligned right on wide screens */}
                  <div className="card-actions">
                    <a className="btn-cta" href={p.cta.href} aria-label={p.cta.text}>
                      {p.cta.text}
                    </a>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </motion.article>
          ))}
        </section>

        {/* Build your plan (mini cards) ‚Äî rounded + background box + motion */}
        <section id="build-your-plan" className="build" aria-label="Build your plan">
          <h2>Build your plan</h2>
          <p className="muted">Pick the pieces you need ‚Äî landing pages, eCommerce builds, motion shorts, templates and more.</p>

          <div className="mini-grid">
            <motion.article
              className="mini"
              whileHover={{ y: -6 }}
              transition={{ type: "spring", damping: 16, stiffness: 200 }}
            >
              <div className="mini-bg" style={{ backgroundImage: url('/mini-websites.jpg') }} aria-hidden />
              <div className="mini-content">
                <h4>Websites</h4>
                <p>Landing pages to full eCommerce, optimised for conversion and SEO.</p>
                <a className="btn-outline" href="/plan-builder">
                  Build Your Plan
                </a>
              </div>
            </motion.article>

            <motion.article
              className="mini"
              whileHover={{ y: -6 }}
              transition={{ type: "spring", damping: 16, stiffness: 200 }}
            >
              <div className="mini-bg" style={{ backgroundImage: url('/mini-design.jpg') }} aria-hidden />
              <div className="mini-content">
                <h4>Design & Graphics</h4>
                <p>Pitch decks, templates and brand visuals that tell your story.</p>
                <a className="btn-outline" href="/plan-builder">
                  Build Your Plan
                </a>
              </div>
            </motion.article>

            <motion.article
              className="mini"
              whileHover={{ y: -6 }}
              transition={{ type: "spring", damping: 16, stiffness: 200 }}
            >
              <div className="mini-bg" style={{ backgroundImage: url('/mini-video.jpg') }} aria-hidden />
              <div className="mini-content">
                <h4>Video & Motion</h4>
                <p>Short edits, motion graphics and branded explainers for social and ads.</p>
                <a className="btn-outline" href="/plan-builder">
                  Build Your Plan
                </a>
              </div>
            </motion.article>
          </div>
        </section>

        {/* How we work */}
        <section className="how" aria-label="How we work">
          <h3>How we work ‚Äî simple, transparent, results first</h3>
          <div className="steps">
            <div className="step">
              <strong>1. Quick audit (free)</strong>
              <p>20 min call + 3 quick wins + short audit summary.</p>
            </div>
            <div className="step">
              <strong>2. Tailored plan</strong>
              <p>30 day plan with content cadence and measurable KPIs.</p>
            </div>
            <div className="step">
              <strong>3. Execute & improve</strong>
              <p>We publish, optimise and report weekly actions, monthly results.</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        {/* CTA */}
        <section className="cta" aria-label="Start now">
          <div className="cta-inner">
            <div className="cta-copy">
              <h4>Ready to start?</h4>
              <p>Book a 20 minute call ‚Äî we‚Äôll send a short audit and an actionable proposal.</p>
            </div>
            <div>
              <a className="btn-primary large" href="/contact">
                Book a Call
              </a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
      </main>

      <style jsx>{
        :root {
          --bg: #f6f0ea;
          --muted: #6b6b6b;
          --accent: #0b6bff;
          --card: #fff;
          --radius: 14px;
          --maxW: 1100px;
        }

        .page {
          background: var(--bg);
          color: #0f1720;
          font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Arial;
          min-height: 100vh;
        }

        /* HERO */
        .hero {
          position: relative;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          padding: 64px 20px;
          overflow: hidden;
        }
        .hero-bg {
          position: absolute;
          inset: 0;
          z-index: 0;
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center;
          filter: brightness(0.45);
        }
        .hero-inner {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
          text-align: center;
          max-width: var(--maxW);
          margin: 0 auto;
          color: #fff;
        }
        .title {
          font-size: 34px;
          margin: 0 0 12px;
          font-weight: 800;
          line-height: 1.04;
          text-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.55);
        }
        .subtitle {
          font-size: 15px;
          color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
          max-width: 820px;
          margin: 0 auto 18px;
          line-height: 1.6;
          text-shadow: 0 3px 14px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45);
        }
        .hero-ctas {
          display: flex;
          gap: 12px;
          justify-content: center;
          margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .btn-primary {
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--accent), #0a5ce6);
          color: #fff;
          padding: 12px 18px;
          border-radius: 10px;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-decoration: none;
          box-shadow: 0 12px 36px rgba(11, 107, 255, 0.14);
        }
        /* slight visual difference for the second primary (reduced shadow, subtle border) */
        .btn-primary.secondary {
          box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(11, 107, 255, 0.10);
          border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
        }
        .btn-ghost {
          background: transparent;
          color: #fff;
          border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16);
          padding: 10px 14px;
          border-radius: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
          font-weight: 600;
        }

        /* Main container */
        .container {
          max-width: var(--maxW);
          margin: 28px auto;
          padding: 0 20px;
        }

        /* Cards list */
        .cards {
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 18px;
          margin-top: 6px;
        }

        /* Card */
        .card {
          position: relative;
          overflow: visible;
          border-radius: var(--radius);
          padding: 20px;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          background: transparent;
        }
        .card-layer {
          position: absolute;
          inset: 6px;
          border-radius: calc(var(--radius) - 2px);
          background: var(--card);
          box-shadow: 0 18px 48px rgba(6, 10, 18, 0.06);
          border: 1px solid rgba(10, 12, 18, 0.04);
          z-index: 0;
          pointer-events: none;
        }

        .card-grid {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 1;
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: 80px 1fr;
          gap: 20px;
          align-items: start;
        }

        .card-icon {
          display: flex;
          align-items: flex-start;
        }
        .icon-box {
          width: 80px;
          height: 80px;
          border-radius: 12px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fff, #fbfbfb);
          border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
          box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(11, 107, 255, 0.06);
        }

        .card-content {
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 12px;
        }
        .card-headline {
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 8px;
        }
        .tag {
          color: var(--muted);
          font-weight: 700;
          font-size: 12px;
          text-transform: uppercase;
          letter-spacing: 0.06em;
        }
        .card-title {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: 18px;
          font-weight: 800;
          color: #0b2130;
        }
        .card-desc {
          margin: 0;
          color: #475569;
          font-size: 14px;
          line-height: 1.55;
        }

        .outcome-grid {
          margin-top: 6px;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 8px;
        }
        .outcome-grid .row {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: 160px 1fr;
          gap: 12px;
          align-items: start;
        }
        .outcome-grid dt {
          font-weight: 700;
          color: var(--muted);
          font-size: 13px;
        }
        .outcome-grid dd {
          margin: 0;
          color: #111827;
          line-height: 1.6;
          font-size: 14px;
        }
        .time-note {
          margin-top: 8px;
          color: #6b7280;
          font-size: 13px;
          line-height: 1.45;
          /* subtle accent for timeframe note */
        }

        .deliverables {
          margin-top: 10px;
          color: #0b2130;
        }
        .deliverables strong {
          display: block;
          margin-bottom: 6px;
          color: var(--muted);
          font-size: 13px;
          font-weight: 700;
        }
        .deliverables ul {
          margin: 0;
          padding-left: 18px;
        }
        .deliverables li {
          margin-bottom: 6px;
          color: #374151;
          font-size: 14px;
          line-height: 1.5;
        }

        .card-actions {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: flex-end;
          margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .btn-cta {
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--accent), #0a5ce6);
          color: #fff;
          padding: 10px 16px;
          border-radius: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
          font-weight: 800;
          display: inline-block;
          box-shadow: 0 12px 36px rgba(11, 107, 255, 0.12);
        }

        /* BUILD / MINI GRID - restored background & motion (rounded) */
        .build {
          margin-top: 28px;
        }
        .muted {
          color: #64748b;
          margin-top: 6px;
        }
        .mini-grid {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
          gap: 16px;
          margin-top: 12px;
        }

        .mini {
          position: relative;
          border-radius: 14px; /* rounded outer */
          overflow: hidden;
          min-height: 160px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          background: var(--card); /* white background */
          box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
          transition: transform 0.28s ease, box-shadow 0.28s ease;
        }
        .mini-bg {
          position: absolute;
          inset: 0;
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center;
          opacity: 0.08;
          filter: contrast(0.95) saturate(0.9);
          border-radius: 14px; /* ensure bg also rounded */
          transition: transform 0.32s ease, opacity 0.32s ease;
        }
        .mini-content {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
          padding: 18px;
          border-radius: 14px; /* rounded inner */
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.96));
          width: 100%;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          justify-content: space-between;
          gap: 12px;
          box-shadow: inset 0 -8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);
        }
        .mini h4 {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: 16px;
        }
        .mini p {
          margin: 0;
          color: #475569;
          font-size: 13.5px;
          line-height: 1.5;
        }

        .btn-outline {
          display: inline-block;
          padding: 8px 12px;
          border-radius: 8px;
          border: 1px solid rgba(11, 107, 255, 0.12);
          color: var(--accent);
          text-decoration: none;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        /* hover effect for mini cards */
        .mini:hover {
          transform: translateY(-6px);
          box-shadow: 0 14px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        .mini:hover .mini-bg {
          transform: scale(1.04);
          opacity: 0.12;
        }
        .mini:hover .mini-content {
          box-shadow: 0 18px 42px rgba(6, 10, 18, 0.06);
          transform: translateY(-6px);
          transition: transform 0.28s ease;
        }

        /* How we work */
        .how {
          margin-top: 28px;
        }
        .steps {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
          gap: 12px;
          margin-top: 12px;
        }
        .step {
          background: var(--card);
          padding: 14px;
          border-radius: 12px;
          box-shadow: 0 8px 26px rgba(6, 10, 18, 0.04);
          border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03);
        }
        .step strong {
          display: block;
          margin-bottom: 6px;
        }

        /* CTA area */
        .cta {
          margin-top: 28px;
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--accent), #0a5ce6);
          border-radius: 12px;
          padding: 14px;
          color: #fff;
        }

import Head from "next/head";
import { useState, useEffect } from "react";

const SITE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL || "https://your-project.vercel.app";
const PAGE_URL = SITE_URL + "/about";
const OG_IMAGE = SITE_URL + "/about-og.jpg";

export default function AboutPage() {
  const [time, setTime] = useState(null);
  const [error, setError] = useState(null);
  const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    try {
      // Initialize time safely
      const now = new Date();
      setTime(now);
      setIsLoaded(true);
      
      // Set up timer for real-time updates
      const timer = setInterval(() => {
        try {
          const currentTime = new Date();
          setTime(currentTime);
        } catch (err) {
          console.error("Clock update error:", err);
        }
      }, 1000);

      return () => clearInterval(timer);
    } catch (err) {
      setError("Clock initialization failed");
      console.error("Clock initialization error:", err);
    }
  }, []);

  // Safe time formatting
  if (!time || error) {
    return (
      <div style={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        justifyContent: 'center', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        minHeight: '100vh',
        fontFamily: 'Manrope, sans-serif',
        padding: '20px',
        textAlign: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#ffffff'
      }}>
        <div>
          <h3 style={{ color: '#071428', marginBottom: '10px', fontSize: '24px' }}>Premium Experience Loading...</h3>
          <p style={{ color: '#6b7780', fontSize: '16px' }}>
            {error ? "We're experiencing a technical issue. Please refresh." : "Initializing luxury experience..."}
          </p>
          <div style={{ marginTop: '20px', height: '4px', width: '100px', background: '#0b61e6', margin: '0 auto', borderRadius: '2px' }}></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // Format time as HH:MM:SS

3) Detailed JSON report (Node script) ‚Äî ek-click report
Agar tum chaho main short Node script de doon jo pages/ scan karke JSON output de (file, hasTitle, hasDescription, titleText, descriptionText). Yeh ek reproducible report banayega jo tum commit ya share kar sakte ho.

seo-report.js (project root me save karo) ‚Äî phir node seo-report.js chalao.

// seo-report.js
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

const pagesDir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'pages');

function walk(dir){
  let out = [];
  for(const f of fs.readdirSync(dir)){
    const full = path.join(dir, f);
    const stat = fs.statSync(full);
    if(stat.isDirectory()) out = out.concat(walk(full));
    else if(/\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$/.test(full)) out.push(full);
  }
  return out;
}

function extractMeta(content){
  const titleMatch = content.match(/<title[^>]*>([\s\S]*?)<\/title>/i);
  const descMatch = content.match(/<meta\s+name=["']description["'][^>]*content=["']([^"']*)["'][^>]*>/i)
                 || content.match(/<meta\s+content=["']([^"']*)["'][^>]*name=["']description["'][^>]*>/i);
  return {
    hasTitle: !!titleMatch,
    title: titleMatch ? titleMatch[1].trim() : null,
    hasDescription: !!descMatch,
    description: descMatch ? descMatch[1].trim() : null
  };
}

const files = walk(pagesDir);
const results = files.map(f => {
  const content = fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf8');
  return { file: path.relative(process.cwd(), f), ...extractMeta(content) };
});

const summary = {
  totalPagesScanned: results.length,
  pagesWithTitle: results.filter(r => r.hasTitle).length,
  pagesWithDescription: results.filter(r => r.hasDescription).length,
  details: results
};

fs.writeFileSync('seo-report.json', JSON.stringify(summary, null, 2));
console.log('Report written to seo-report.json');
console.log(`Scanned ${summary.totalPagesScanned} files ‚Äî titles: ${summary.pagesWithTitle}, descriptions: ${summary.pagesWithDescription}`);

export default function Blog() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const slug = router.query.slug || null;
  const post = POSTS.find((p) => p.slug === slug) || null;

  const handleBack = () => {
    // go back in history if possible, otherwise go to blog index
    if (typeof window !== "undefined" && window.history.length > 1) {
      router.back();
    } else {
      router.push("/blog");
    }
  };

  if (post) {
    const url = ${SITE_URL}/blog?slug=${post.slug};
    const jsonLd = {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "Article",
      headline: post.title,
      datePublished: post.date,
      author: { "@type": "Person", name: post.author },
      publisher: { "@type": "Organization", name: "Soarix", logo: { "@type": "ImageObject", url: SITE_URL + "/logo.png" } },
      description: post.excerpt,
      mainEntityOfPage: url,
    };

    return (
      <>
        <Head>
          <title>{post.title} | Soarix</title>
          <meta name="description" content={post.excerpt} />

          <meta property="og:description" content={post.excerpt} />
          <meta property="og:url" content={url} />
          <meta property="og:type" content="article" />
          <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />
          <meta name="twitter:title" content={post.title} />
          <meta name="twitter:description" content={post.excerpt} />
          <script type="application/ld+json" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(jsonLd) }} />
          {/* Premium fonts: Satoshi + Manrope + Playfair Display for highlights */}
          <link
            href="https://api.fontshare.com/v2/css?f[]=satoshi@400,600,700,800&f[]=manrope@400,600,700&display=swap"
            rel="stylesheet"
          />
          <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" />
          <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
        </Head>

        <main className="page">
          <article className="article card fade-in" role="article">
            {/* Back control + header */}

              <button className="back-button" onClick={handleBack} aria-label="Go back">‚Üê Back</button>

            <div className="article-header center-header">
              <div className="kicker">Soarix Insights</div>

                <span className="dot">‚Ä¢</span>

              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="article-body">
              {BODIES[post.slug]}
            </div>
          </article>

          <style jsx>{
            /* animations */
            @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
            @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }
            @keyframes textGradientFlow { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } }

            :root {
              --primary: #0066ff;
              --accent: #00e0b8;
              --text: #1a1a1a;
              --text-light: #666;
              --border: #e9e9ea;
              --bg: #faf7f4;
              --card: #fff;
              --radius: 16px;
            }

            * { box-sizing: border-box; }

            .page {
              background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--bg) 0%, #fff 100%);
              min-height: 100vh;
              padding: 80px 24px 60px;
              font-family: "Satoshi", "Manrope", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Inter", "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
              display: flex;

            }

            .card {

              box-shadow: 0 8px 26px rgba(11,13,16,0.06);
              border: 1px solid rgba(11,13,16,0.03);
            }

            .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out; }

            /* top controls */
            .article-top {
              display: flex;
              justify-content: flex-start;
              margin-bottom: 12px;

            .back-button {

              color: var(--primary);

              cursor: pointer;

              transition: background 0.12s ease, transform 0.12s ease;
            }
            .back-button:hover { background: rgba(6,102,255,0.06); transform: translateY(-2px); }

            /* Center header: kicker/title/meta centered */
            .center-header { text-align: center; }

            .article-header {
              margin-bottom: 28px;

              color: #20303b;
              text-align: justify;
              -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
              -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            }

            .lead { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 20px; color: var(--text); text-align: justify; }

            .pull {
              background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(6,102,255,0.03), transparent);
              border-left: 4px solid var(--primary);
              padding: 18px;
              margin: 20px 0;
              border-radius: 10px;
              font-style: italic;
            }
            .muted { color: var(--text-light); font-size: 15px; margin-top: 12px; }

            /* === highlights: premium font + gradient text for <strong> ===
               Strong uses Playfair Display (premium serif) and gradient fill.
            */
            strong {

              font-weight: 700;
              font-size: 1.02em;
              background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00e0b8 0%, #00c6ff 45%, #0072ff 100%);

              -webkit-background-clip: text;
              -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
              background-clip: text;
              text-fill-color: transparent;
              animation: textGradientFlow 6s linear infinite;
            }

            .article-footer {
              margin-top: 56px;
              padding-top: 32px;
              border-top: 1px solid var(--border);
              background: transparent !important;
              color: inherit !important;
              box-shadow: none !important;
              border: none !important;
            }

            /* CTA area */
            .cta-wrap { display:flex; justify-content:center; margin-bottom:18px; }
            .cta-card {
              width: 100%;
              max-width: 680px;
              background: #fff;
              border-radius: 14px;

              box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(8,12,20,0.06);
              border: 1px solid rgba(8,12,20,0.04);
              text-align: center;
              transition: transform 0.25s ease, box-shadow 0.25s ease;
            }
            .cta-card:hover {
              transform: translateY(-6px);
              box-shadow: 0 18px 44px rgba(8,12,20,0.10);
            }

            .btn-primary {
              background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, #005bd6 100%);

              padding: 12px 18px;

              gap: 8px;
              box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,114,255,0.08);
            }
            .btn-primary:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); }

            /* responsive tweaks */
            @media (max-width: 880px) {
              .page { padding: 56px 18px; }
              .card { padding: 36px; }
              .title { font-size: 32px; }
              .article-body { font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.68; }
              .meta { font-size: 14px; }
            }

            @media (max-width: 520px) {
              .page { padding: 30px 14px; }
              .card { padding: 20px; border-radius: 12px; }

              .meta { display: flex; gap: 6px; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center; font-size: 13px; }
              .article-top { margin-bottom: 8px; }
            }
          }</style>
        </main>
      </>
    );
  }

  // INDEX (list of posts)

export default function Blog() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const slug = router.query.slug || null;
  const post = POSTS.find((p) => p.slug === slug) || null;

  // Helper OG image selection (you can replace with real images per post)
  const ogFor = (slugVal) => {
    if (!slugVal) return DEFAULT_OG;
    return SITE_URL + "/og/" + slugVal + ".jpg"; // create these on server if possible
  };

  const handleBack = () => {
    if (typeof window !== "undefined" && window.history.length > 1) {
      router.back();
    } else {
      router.push("/blog");
    }
  };

  if (post) {
    const url = `${SITE_URL}/blog?slug=${post.slug}`;
    const og = ogFor(post.slug);
    const jsonLd = {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "Article",
      mainEntityOfPage: {
        "@type": "WebPage",
        "@id": url
      },
      headline: post.title,
      description: post.excerpt,
      image: [og],
      author: { "@type": "Person", name: post.author },
      publisher: {
        "@type": "Organization",
        name: "Soarix",
        logo: { "@type": "ImageObject", url: SITE_URL + "/logo.png" }
      },
      datePublished: post.date,
      dateModified: post.date
    };

    return (
      <>
        <Head>
          <title>{post.title} | Soarix</title>
          <meta name="description" content={post.excerpt} />
          <meta name="author" content={post.author} />
          <meta name="robots" content="index, follow" />
          <link rel="canonical" href={url} />
          <meta property="og:title" content={post.title} />
          <meta property="og:description" content={post.excerpt} />
          <meta property="og:url" content={url} />
          <meta property="og:image" content={og} />
          <meta property="og:type" content="article" />
          <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
          <meta name="twitter:title" content={post.title} />
          <meta name="twitter:description" content={post.excerpt} />
          <meta name="twitter:image" content={og} />
          <meta property="article:published_time" content={post.date} />
          <meta property="article:author" content={post.author} />
          {/* JSON-LD */}
          <script type="application/ld+json" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(jsonLd) }} />
          {/* Fonts (kept same) */}
          <link
            href="https://api.fontshare.com/v2/css?f[]=satoshi@400,600,700,800&f[]=manrope@400,600,700&display=swap"
            rel="stylesheet"
          />
          <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" />
          <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
        </Head>

        <main className="page">
          <article className="article card fade-in" role="article" aria-labelledby="article-title">
            <div className="article-top">
              <button className="back-button" onClick={handleBack} aria-label="Go back">‚Üê Back</button>
            </div>

            <header className="article-header center-header">
              <div className="kicker">Soarix Insights</div>
              <h1 id="article-title" className="title">{post.title}</h1>
              <div className="meta">
                <time dateTime={post.date}>{post.displayDate}</time>
                <span className="dot">‚Ä¢</span>
                <span>{post.author}</span>
                <span className="dot">‚Ä¢</span>
                <span>{post.readTime}</span>
              </div>
            </header>

            <div className="article-body">
              {BODIES[post.slug]}
            </div>
          </article>

          {/* styles (kept and slightly improved for accessibility) */}
          <style jsx>{`
            @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
            @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }
            @keyframes textGradientFlow { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } }

            :root {
              --primary: #0066ff;
              --accent: #00e0b8;
              --text: #1a1a1a;
              --text-light: #666;
              --border: #e9e9ea;
              --bg: #faf7f4;
              --card: #fff;
              --radius: 16px;
            }

            * { box-sizing: border-box; }

            .page {
              background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--bg) 0%, #fff 100%);
              min-height: 100vh;
              padding: 80px 24px 60px;
              font-family: "Satoshi", "Manrope", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Inter", "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
              display: flex;
              justify-content: center;
              color: var(--text);
              line-height: 1.6;
            }

            .card {
              width: 100%;
              max-width: 760px;
              background: var(--card);
              border-radius: var(--radius);
              padding: 48px;
              box-shadow: 0 8px 26px rgba(11,13,16,0.06);
              border: 1px solid rgba(11,13,16,0.03);
            }

            .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out; }

            .article-top { display:flex; justify-content: flex-start; margin-bottom: 12px; }
            .back-button { background: transparent; border: none; color: var(--primary); font-weight: 700; cursor: pointer; padding: 6px 8px; border-radius: 8px; }
            .back-button:hover { background: rgba(6,102,255,0.06); transform: translateY(-2px); }

            .center-header { text-align:center; }

            .article-header { margin-bottom: 28px; padding-bottom: 18px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border); }
            .kicker { color: var(--primary); font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px; animation: slideIn 0.5s ease-out 0.1s both; }
            .title { font-size: 36px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.14; margin: 0 0 12px; color: var(--text); animation: slideIn 0.5s ease-out 0.2s both; word-break: keep-all; }
            .meta { display: inline-flex; gap: 8px; align-items: center; font-size: 15px; color: var(--text-light); animation: slideIn 0.5s ease-out 0.3s both; margin-top: 8px; }
            .dot { opacity: 0.5; }

            .article-body { font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.7; animation: slideIn 0.6s ease-out 0.4s both; color: #20303b; text-align: justify; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; }
            .article-body h3 { font-size: 22px; margin: 28px 0 12px; color: var(--text); text-align: left; }
            .article-body p { margin: 0 0 18px; text-align: justify; }
            .lead { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 20px; color: var(--text); text-align: justify; }

            .pull { background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(6,102,255,0.03), transparent); border-left: 4px solid var(--primary); padding: 18px; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 10px; font-style: italic; }
            .muted { color: var(--text-light); }

            strong {
              font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
              font-weight: 700;
              font-size: 1.02em;
              background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00e0b8 0%, #00c6ff 45%, #0072ff 100%);
              background-size: 300% 100%;
              -webkit-background-clip: text;
              -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
              background-clip: text;
              text-fill-color: transparent;
              animation: textGradientFlow 6s linear infinite;
            }

            .article-footer { margin-top: 56px; padding-top: 32px; border-top: 1px solid var(--border); }

            /* small screens */
            @media (max-width: 880px) {
              .page { padding: 56px 18px; }
              .card { padding: 36px; }
              .title { font-size: 32px; }
              .article-body { font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.68; }
              .meta { font-size: 14px; }
            }
            @media (max-width: 520px) {
              .page { padding: 30px 14px; }
              .card { padding: 20px; border-radius: 12px; }
              .title { font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.15; }
              .article-body { font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-align: left; }
              .lead { font-size: 16px; }
              .kicker { font-size: 11px; }
              .meta { display:flex; gap:6px; flex-wrap:wrap; justify-content:center; font-size:13px; }
              .article-top { margin-bottom: 8px; }
            }
          `}</style>
        </main>
      </>
    );
  }

  // INDEX (list of posts) w/ ItemList JSON-LD for SEO
  const listUrl = `${SITE_URL}/blog`;
  const itemListJsonLd = {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "ItemList",
    "name": "Soarix Blog",
    "description": "Concise, executive overviews on marketing, brand and AI-powered growth from Soarix.",
    "url": listUrl,
    "itemListElement": POSTS.map((p, i) => ({
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": i + 1,
      "url": `${listUrl}?slug=${p.slug}`,
      "name": p.title,
      "description": p.excerpt
    }))
  };

  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Insights ‚Äî Soarix</title>
        <meta name="description" content="Concise, executive overviews on marketing, brand and AI-powered growth from Soarix." />
        <meta name="robots" content="index, follow" />
        <link rel="canonical" href={listUrl} />
        <meta property="og:title" content="Soarix Insights ‚Äî Marketing, Brand & AI" />
        <meta property="og:description" content="Concise, executive overviews on marketing, brand and AI-powered growth from Soarix." />
        <meta property="og:url" content={listUrl} />
        <meta property="og:image" content={DEFAULT_OG} />
        <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
        <script type="application/ld+json" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(itemListJsonLd) }} />
        <link
          href="https://api.fontshare.com/v2/css?f[]=satoshi@400,600,700,800&f[]=manrope@400,600,700&display=swap"
          rel="stylesheet"
        />
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" />
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@600,700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
      </Head>

      <main className="index-page">
        <div className="index-wrap">
          <header className="index-header fade-in">
            <div className="kicker">Soarix Insights</div>
            <h1 className="index-title">Strategic thinking on growth, brand & AI</h1>
            <p className="index-sub">Real talk for founders and marketing leaders who want to cut through the noise and focus on what actually works.</p>
          </header>

          <section className="posts-grid" aria-labelledby="blog-list">
            <h2 id="blog-list" style={{position:'absolute', left:-9999, top:'auto', width:1, height:1, overflow:'hidden'}}>Blog posts</h2>
            {POSTS.map((p, i) => (
              <article key={p.slug} className="post-card" style={{ animationDelay: `${i * 0.06}s` }}>
                <div className="post-content">
                  <div className="post-meta">
                    <time dateTime={p.date}>{p.displayDate}</time>
                    <span className="dot">‚Ä¢</span>
                    <span>{p.readTime}</span>
                  </div>
                  <h2 className="post-title">{p.title}</h2>
                  <p className="post-excerpt">{p.excerpt}</p>
                  <a className="read-link" href={`/blog?slug=${p.slug}`} aria-label={`Read article ${p.title}`}>
                    <span>Read article</span>
                    <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" aria-hidden>
                      <path d="M6 3L11 8L6 13" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"/>
                    </svg>
                  </a>
                </div>
              </article>
            ))}
          </section>
        </div>

        <style jsx>{`
          @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
          @keyframes cardSlide { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

          :root { --primary:#0066ff; --text:#1a1a1a; --text-light:#666; --border:#e9e9ea; --bg:#faf7f4; --card:#fff; }

          * { box-sizing: border-box; }

          .index-page {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--bg) 0%, #fff 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 80px 24px 60px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            font-family: "Satoshi", "Manrope", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Inter", "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--text);
          }

          .index-wrap { width: 100%; max-width: 1100px; }

          .index-header { margin-bottom: 56px; text-align: center; animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out; }
          .kicker { color: var(--primary); font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px; }
          .index-title { font-size: 44px; font-weight: 700; margin: 0 0 16px; line-height: 1.1; color: var(--text); }
          .index-sub { font-size: 18px; color: var(--text-light); max-width: 680px; margin: 0 auto; line-height: 1.5; }

          .posts-grid { display: grid; gap: 20px; }

          .post-card {
            background: var(--card);
            border: 1px solid var(--border);
            border-radius: 14px;
            padding: 28px;
            transition: transform 0.28s ease, box-shadow 0.28s ease, border-color 0.28s ease;
            animation: cardSlide 0.5s ease-out both;
          }
          .post-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-6px);
            box-shadow: 0 18px 44px rgba(8,12,20,0.08);
            border-color: rgba(6,102,255,0.12);
          }

          .post-meta { display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center; color:var(--text-light); margin-bottom:10px; }
          .post-title { font-size: 22px; margin: 0 0 10px; color: var(--text); }
          .post-excerpt { font-size: 16px; color: var(--text-light); margin: 0 0 14px; }
          .read-link { display:inline-flex; gap:8px; align-items:center; color:var(--primary); font-weight:700; text-decoration:none; transition: gap 0.16s ease; }
          .read-link:hover { gap: 14px; }

          @media (max-width: 760px) {
            .index-page { padding: 40px 20px; }
            .index-title { font-size: 32px; }
            .post-card { padding: 20px; border-radius: 12px; }
            .post-title { font-size: 20px; }
          }
        `}</style>
      </main>
    </>
  );
}
Kya maine SEO kya-kya add kiya?
Article page pe: og:title, og:description, og:image, twitter:card, article:published_time, author, canonical.

Article page me JSON-LD Article schema (well-formed mainEntityOfPage, image, publisher, dates).

Index page pe JSON-LD ItemList (search engines ko bata deta hai list of posts).

robots meta tag (index, follow) added.

Better dateTime usage for <time> elements (semantic).

Accessible hidden heading for list (aria-labelledby).

Small ARIA improvement on read links/back button.

Extra notes / next steps (recommendations)
OG images: agar tumhare paas per-post OG images hai to unko public/og/<slug>.jpg jaisa rakh do ‚Äî tab social shares beautiful lagenge. Filhal code fallback karta hai DEFAULT_OG.

Sitemap / RSS: generate karo /sitemap.xml aur RSS feed ‚Äî SEO me helpful.

Canonical consistency: agar tum same content reachable via /blog?slug=... and /blog/<slug> prefer karna to pick one canonical URL pattern. Currently code uses query style ‚Äî recommended to move to pretty URLs (/blog/[slug].js) long-term.

Performance: fonts load from Fontshare + Google; ensure to self-host or preload critical fonts if LCP matters.

    position: absolute;

    transform: translateX(-10px) scale(0.98);

    pointer-events: none;

  /* On hover/focus make arrow visible with slide-in + tiny wiggle */
  .card:hover .arrow,

    opacity: 1;

  @keyframes arrowPulse {

  @keyframes pop {

  /* Arrow style (initially hidden, slides in on hover) */
  .arrow {
    position: absolute;
    right: 18px;
    bottom: 18px;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 1;
    color: var(--accent, #0b6bff);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-10px) scale(0.98);
    transition: transform 300ms cubic-bezier(.2,.9,.2,1), opacity 200ms ease;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  /* On hover/focus make arrow visible with slide-in + tiny wiggle */
  .card:hover .arrow,
  .card:focus .arrow,
  .card:focus-within .arrow {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0) scale(1);
    animation: arrowPulse 900ms ease-in-out infinite 300ms;
  }

  @keyframes arrowPulse {
    0% { transform: translateX(0) translateY(0) scale(1); }
    50% { transform: translateX(3px) translateY(-1px) scale(1.02); }
    100% { transform: translateX(0) translateY(0) scale(1); }
  }

  /* Make arrow disappear on small screens (optional) */
  @media (max-width: 640px) {
    .arrow { display: none; }
    .card { border-radius: 10px; }
  }
